GE07bhg4c06u:1: anāśritaḥ karma-phalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca na niragnir na cākriyaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c06u:4: citte śuddhe 'pi na dhyānaṃ vinā saṃnyāsa-mātrataḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:5: muktiḥ syād iti ṣaṣṭhe 'smin dhyāna-yogo vitanvate //
GE07bhg4c06u:7: tatra tāvat sarva-karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasya [Gītā 5.13] ity ārabhya saṃnyāsa-pūrvikāyā
GE07bhg4c06u:8: jñāna-niṣṭhāyās tātparyenābhidhānād duḥkha-rūpatvāc ca karmaṇaḥ sahasā saṃnyāsātiprasaṅgaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:9: prāptaṃ vārayituṃ saṃnyāsād api śreṣṭhatvena karma-yogaṃ stauti anāśrita iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:10: karma-phalam anāśrito 'napekṣamāṇaḥ sann avaśya-kāryatayā vihitaṃ karma yaḥ karoti,
GE07bhg4c06u:11: sa eva saṃnyāsī yogī ca na tu niragnir agni-sādhyeṣṭākhya-karma-tyāgī /
GE07bhg4c06u:14: yoga-sūtraṃ tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ pañcamānte yad īritam /
GE07bhg4c06u:16: tatra sarva-karma-tyāgena yogaṃ vidhāsyaṃs tyājyatvena hīnatvam āśaṅkya karma-yogaṃ stauti anāśrita iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:17: karmaṇāṃ phalam āśrito 'napekṣamāṇaḥ phalābhisaṃdhi-rahitaḥ san kāryaṃ kartavyatayā
GE07bhg4c06u:18: śāstreṇa vihitaṃ nityam agnihotrādi karma karoti yaḥ sa karmy api san saṃnyāsī ca yogī ceti stūyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:21: tau cāsya vidyete phala-tyāgāt phala-tṛṣṇā-rūpa-citta-vikṣepābhāvāc ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:22: karma-phala-tṛṣṇā-tyāga evātra gauṇyā vṛttyā saṃnyāsa-yoga-śabdābhyām abhidhīyate sakāmānapekṣya prāśastya-kathanāya /
GE07bhg4c06u:24: tasmād ayaṃ yadyapi na niragnir agni-sādhya-śrauta-karma-tyāgī na bhavati,
GE07bhg4c06u:27: athavā na niragnir na cākriyaḥ saṃnyāsī yogī ceti mantavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:28: kintu sāgniḥ sakriyaś ca niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhāyī saṃnyāsī yogī ceti mantavya iti stūyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:29: apaśavo vā anye go-aśvebhyaḥ paśavo go-aśvān ity atreva praśaṃsā-lakṣaṇayā nañ-anvayopapattiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:30: atra cākriya ity anenaiva sarva-karma-saṃnyāsini labdhe niragnir iti vyarthaṃ syād
GE07bhg4c06u:31: ity agni-śabdena sarvāṇi karmāṇy upalakṣya niragnir iti saṃnyāsī kriyā-śabdena citta-vṛttīr
GE07bhg4c06u:32: upalakṣyākriya iti niruddha-citta-vṛttir yogī ca kathyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:33: tena na niragniḥ saṃnyāsī mantavyo na cākriyo yogī mantavya iti yathā-saṅkhyam ubhaya-vyatireko darśanīyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:34: evaṃ sati nañ-dvayam apy upapannam iti draṣṭavyam //1//
GE07bhg4c06u:38: aṣṭāṅga-yogābhyāse pravṛttenāpi citta-śodhakaṃ niṣkāma-karma na tyājyam ity āha karma-phalam āśrito 'napekṣamāṇaḥ kāryam avaśya-kartavyatvena śāstra-vihitaṃ karma yaḥ karoti,
GE07bhg4c06u:40: sa eva viṣaya-bhogeṣu cittābhāvād yogī cocyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:41: na ca niragnir agnihotrādi-karma-mātra-tyāgavān eva sannyāsy ucyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:42: na cākriyo na daihika-ceṣṭā-śūnyo 'rdha-nimīlita-netra eva yogī cocyate //1//
GE07bhg4c06u:46: proktaṃ karma-yogam aṣṭāṅga-yoga-śiraskam upadekṣyann ādau tau tad-upāyatvāt taṃ karma-yogam stauti bhagavān anāśrita iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:47: karma-phalam paśv-anna-putra-svargādi-kāmanāśrito 'nicchan kāryam avaśya-kartavyatayā vihitaṃ karma yaḥ karoti,
GE07bhg4c06u:51: na niragnir agnihotrādi-karma-tyāgī yati-veśaḥ sannyāsī na cākriyaḥ śarīra-karma-tyāgī ardha-mudrita-netro yogī /
GE07bhg4c06u:52: atra yogam aṣṭāṅgaṃ cikīrṣūṇāṃ sahasā karma na tyājyam iti matam //1//
GE07bhg4c06u:54: yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava /
GE07bhg4c06u:55: na hy asaṃnyasta-saṃkalpo yogī bhavati kaścana //2//
GE07bhg4c06u:56: śrīdharaḥ : kuta ity apekṣāyāṃ karma-yogasyaiva saṃnyāsatvaṃ pratipādayann āha yam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:58: nyāsa evāty arecayat ity ādi śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:59: kevalāt phala-saṃnyasanād dhetor yogam eva taṃ jānīhi /
GE07bhg4c06u:60: kuta ity apekṣāyām iti śabdokto hetur yoge 'py astīty āha na hīti /
GE07bhg4c06u:61: na saṃnyastaḥ phala-saṃkalpo yena sa karma-niṣṭho jñāna-niṣṭho vā kaścid api na hi yogī bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:62: ataḥ phala-saṅkalpa-tyāga-sāmyāt saṃnyāsī ca phala-saṅkalpa-tyāgād eva citta-vikṣepābhāvād yogī ca bhavaty eva sa ity arthaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c06u:64: asaṃnyāse 'pi saṃnyāsa-śabda-prayoge nimitta-bhūtaṃ guṇa-yogaṃ darśayitum āha yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:65: yaṃ sarva-karma-tat-phala-parityāgaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhuḥ śrutayaḥ nyāsa evāty arecayat,
GE07bhg4c06u:66: brāhmaṇāḥ puatraiṣaṇāyāś ca vittaiṣaṇāyāś ca lokaiṣaṇāyāś ca vyutthāyātha bhikṣā-caryaṃ caranti ity ādyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:67: yogaṃ phala-tṛṣṇā-kartṛtvābhimānayoḥ parityāgena vihita-karmānuṣṭhānaṃ taṃ saṃnyāsaṃ viddhi he pāṇḍava /
GE07bhg4c06u:68: abrahma-dattaṃ brahma-dattam ity āha taṃ vayaṃ manyāmahe brahma-datta-sadṛśo 'yam iti nyāyāt para-śabdaḥ paratra prayujyamānaḥ sādṛśyaṃ bodhayati gauṇyā vṛttyā tad-bhāvāropeṇa vā /
GE07bhg4c06u:71: hi yasmād asaṃnyasta-saṃkalpo 'tyakta-phala-saṅkalpaḥ kaścana kaścid api
GE07bhg4c06u:73: api tu sarvo yogī tyakta-phala-saṅkalpa eva bhavatīti phala-tyāga-sāmyāt tṛṣṇā-rūpa-vitta-vṛtti-nirodha-sāmyāc ca gauṇyā vṛttyā karmy eva saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:74: tathā hi - yogaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.2] pramāṇa-viparyaya-vikalpa-nidrā-smṛtaya [YogaS 1.6] iti vṛttayaḥ pañca-vidhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:79: viparyayo mithyā-jñānam tasya pañca bhedā avidyāsmitā-rāga-dveṣābhiniveśaḥ [YogaS 2.3] ta eva ca kleśāḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:82: abhāva-pratyayālambanā vṛttir nidrā [YogaS 1.10] na tu jñānādy-abhāva-mātram ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:83: anubhūta-viṣayāsaṃpramoṣaḥ smṛtiḥ [YogaS 1.11] pūrvānubhava-saṃskārajaṃ jñānam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:86: etādṛśāṃ sarvāsāṃ citta-vṛttīnāṃ norodho yoga iti ca samādhir iti ca kathyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:87: phala-saṅkalpas tu rāgākhyas tṛtīyo viparyaya-bhedas tan-nirodha-mātram api gauṇyā vṛttyā yoga iti saṃnyāsa iti cocyata iti na virodhaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c06u:90: vastutas tathā viṣayebhyaś citta-naiścalyam eva yoga-śabdārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:91: tasmāt saṃnyāsa-yoga-śabdayor aikyārtham evāgatam ity āha yam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:92: asaṃnyasto na saṃnyastas tyaktaḥ saṅkalpaḥ phalākāṅkṣā viṣaya-bhoga-spṛhā yena saḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c06u:93: baladevaḥ : nanu sarvendriya-vṛtti-virati-rūpāyāṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāyāṃ saṃnyāsa-śabdaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhe yoga-śabdaś ca paṭhyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:94: sa ca sarvendriya-vyāpārātmake karma-yoge sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ceti bruvatā bhavatā kayā vṛttyā nīyata iti cet tatrāha yam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:95: yaṃ karma-yogam artha-tātparya-jñāḥ saṃnyāsṃ prāhus tam eva taṃ yogam aṣṭāṅgaṃ viddhi / he pāṇḍava /
GE07bhg4c06u:96: nanu siṃho mānavakaḥ ity ādau śauryādi-guṇa-sādṛśyena tathā prayogaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:97: prakṛteḥ kiṃ sādṛśyam iti cet tatrāha na hīti /
GE07bhg4c06u:98: asaṃnyasta-saṃkalpaḥ kaścana kaścid jñāna-yogy aṣṭāṅga-yogī ca na bhavaty api tu saṃnyasta-saṃkalpa eva bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:99: saṃnyastaḥ parityaktaḥ saṅkalpaḥ phalecchā ca yena saḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:100: tathā phala-tyāga-sādṛśyāt tṛṣṇā-rūpa-citta-vṛtti-nirodha-sādṛśyāc ca karma-yoginas tad-ubhayatvena prayogo gauṇa-vṛttyeti //2//
GE07bhg4c06u:102: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:104: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi yāvaj-jīvaṃ karma-yoga eva prāpta ity āśaṅkya tasyāvadhim āha ārurukṣor iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:105: jñāna-yogam āroḍhuṃ prātum icchoḥ puṃsas tad-ārohe kāraṇaṃ karmocyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:107: jñāna-yogam ārūḍhasya tu tasyaiva dhyāna-niṣṭhasya śamaḥ samādhiś citta-vikṣepaka-karmoparamo jñāna-paripāke kāraṇam ucyate //3//
GE07bhg4c06u:109: tat kiṃ praśastatvāt karma-yoga eva yāvaj-jīvam anuṣṭheya iti nety āha ārurukṣor iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:110: yogam antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhi-rūpaṃ vairāgyam ārurukṣor āroḍhum icchor na tvārūḍhasya
GE07bhg4c06u:111: muner bhaviṣyataḥ karma-phala-tṛṣṇā-tyāginaḥ karma śāstra-vihitam agnihotrādi nityaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:112: bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kṛtaṃ kāraṇaṃ yogārohaṇe sādhanam anuṣṭheyam ucyate veda-mukhena mayā /
GE07bhg4c06u:113: yogārūḍhasya yogam antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhi-rūpaṃ vairāgyaṃ prāptavatas tu tasyaiva pūrvaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:114: karmiṇo 'pi sataḥ śamaḥ sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa eva kāraṇam anuṣṭheyatayā jñāna-paripāka-sādhanam ucyate //3 //
GE07bhg4c06u:116: nanu tarhy aṣṭāṅga-yogino yāvaj-jīvam eva niṣkāma-karma-yogaḥ prāpta ity āśaṅkya tasyāvadhim āha ārurukṣor iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:117: muner yogābhyāsino yogaṃ niścala-dhyāna-yogam āroḍhuṃ icchos tad-ārohe kāraṇaṃ karma cocyate citta-śuddhi-karatvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:118: tatas tasya yogaṃ dhyāna-yogam ārūḍhasya dhyāna-niṣṭhā-prāptaḥ śamaḥ vikṣepaka-sarva-karmoparamaḥ kāraṇam /
GE07bhg4c06u:120: baladevaḥ : nanv evam aṣṭāṅga-yogino yāvaj jīvaṃ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ prāptam iti cet tatrāha ārurukṣor iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:121: muner yogābhyāsino yogaṃ dhyāna-niṣṭhām ārurukṣos tad-ārohe karma kāraṇaṃ hṛd-viśuddhi-kṛttvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:122: tasyaiva yogārūḍhasya dhyāna-niṣṭhasya tad-dāḍhye śamo vikṣepaka-karmoparatiḥ kāraṇam //3//
GE07bhg4c06u:124: yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasv anuṣajjate /
GE07bhg4c06u:126: śrīdharaḥ : kīdṛśo 'yaṃ yogārūḍho yasya śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyata iti ?
GE07bhg4c06u:128: indriyārtheṣv indriya-bhogyeṣu śabdādiśu tat-sādhaneṣu ca karmasu yadā nānuṣajjate āsaktiṃ na karoti /
GE07bhg4c06u:129: tatra hetuḥ āsakti-mūla-bhūtān sarvā bhoga-viṣayān karma-viṣayāṃś ca saṅkalpān saṃnyasituṃ tyaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:133: yadā yasmiṃś citta-samādhāna-kāla indriyārtheṣu śabdādiśu karmasu ca nitya-naimittika-kāmya-laukika-pratiṣiddheṣu
GE07bhg4c06u:135: ca prayojanābhāva-buddhyāham eteṣāṃ kartā mamaite bhogyā ity abhiniveśa-rūpam anuṣaṅgaṃ na karoti /
GE07bhg4c06u:136: hi yasmāt tasmāt sarva-saṅkalpa-saṃnyāsī sarveṣāṃ saṅkalpānām idaṃ mayā kartavyam
GE07bhg4c06u:137: etat phalaṃ bhoktavyam ity evaṃ rūpāṇāṃ mano-vṛtti-viśeṣāṇāṃ tad-viṣayāṇāṃ ca kāmānāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:139: tadā śabdādiṣu karmasu cānuṣaṅgasya tad-dhetoś ca saṅkalpasya yogārohaṇa-pratibandhakasyābhāvād yogaṃ samādhim ārūḍho yogārūḍha ity ucyate //4//
GE07bhg4c06u:141: samyak-śuddha-cittas tu yogārūḍhas taj-jñāpakaṃ lakṣaṇam āha yadeti /
GE07bhg4c06u:144: indriyārtheṣu śabdādiṣu tat-sādhaneṣu karmasu ca yadātmānanda-rasikaḥ san na sajjate /
GE07bhg4c06u:146: sarvān bhoga-viṣayān karma-viṣayāś ca saṅkalpānāsattimūla-bhūtān saṃnyasituṃ parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c06u:149: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ //5//
GE07bhg4c06u:150: śrīdharaḥ : ato viṣayāsakti-tyāge mokṣaṃ tad-āsaktau ca bandhaṃ paryālocya rāgādi-svabhāvaṃ tyajed ity āha uddhared iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:152: na tv avasādayed adho na nayet /
GE07bhg4c06u:153: hi yata ātmaiva manaḥ-saṅgādy-uparata ātmanaḥ svasya bandhur upakārakaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:156: yo yadaivaṃ yogārūḍho bhavati tadā tenātmanaivātmoddhṛto bhavati saṃsārānartha-vrātāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:158: ātmanā viveka-yuktena manasātmānaṃ svaṃ jīvaṃ saṃsāra-samudre nimagnaṃ tata uddharet /
GE07bhg4c06u:161: na tu viṣayāsaṅgenātmānam avasādayet saṃsāra-samudre majjayet /
GE07bhg4c06u:162: hi yasmād ātmaivātmano bandhur hitakārī saṃsāra-bandhanān mocana-hetur nānyaḥ kaścil laukikasya bandhor api snehānubandhena bandha-hetutvāt
GE07bhg4c06u:165: bāhyasyāpi ripor ātma-prayuktatvād yuktam avadhāraṇam ātmaivaa ripur ātmana iti //5//
GE07bhg4c06u:167: yasmād indriyārthāsaktyaivātmā saṃsāra-kūpe patitas taṃ yatnenoddhared iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:169: viṣayāsakti-sahitena manasā tv ātmānaṃ nāvasādayet na saṃsāra-kūpe pātayet /
GE07bhg4c06u:170: tasmād ātmā mana eva bandhur mana eva ripuḥ //5//
GE07bhg4c06u:172: viṣayādy-āsakta-manaskatayā saṃsāra-kūpe nimagnam ātmānaṃ jīvam ātmanā viṣayāsakti-rahitena manasā tasmād uddhared ūrdhvaṃ haret /
GE07bhg4c06u:173: viṣayāsaktena manasātmānaṃ nāvasādayet tatra na nimajjayet /
GE07bhg4c06u:174: hi niścaye naivam ātmaiva mana evātmanaḥ svasya bandhus tad eva ripuḥ / smṛtiś ca -
GE07bhg4c06u:176: bandhāya viṣayāsaṅgo muktyai nirviṣayaṃ manaḥ // iti //5//
GE07bhg4c06u:181: katham-bhūtasya cātmaiva ripur ity apekṣāyām āha bandhur iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:182: yenātmanaivātmā kārya-kāraṇa-saṅghāta-rūpo jito vaśīkṛtasya tathābhūtasyātmana ātmaiva bandhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:183: anātmano 'jitātmanas tv ātmaivātmanaḥ śatrutve śatruvad apakāra-kāritve varteta //6//
GE07bhg4c06u:185: idānīṃ kiṃ-lakṣaṇa ātmātmano bandhuḥ kiṃ-lakṣaṇo vātmano ripur ity ucyate bandhur iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:186: ātmā kārya-karaṇa-saṃghāto yena jitaḥ sva-vaśīkṛta ātmanaiva viveka-yuktena manasaiva na tu śastrādinā /
GE07bhg4c06u:187: tasyātmā svarūpam ātmano bandhur ucchṛṅkhala-sva-pravṛtty-abhāvena sva-hita-karaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:193: kasya sa ripur ity apekṣāyām āha bandhur iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:194: yenātmanā jīvenātmā mano jitas tasya jīvasya sa ātmā mano bandhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:195: anātmano 'jita-manasas tv ātmaiva mana eva śatruvat śatrutve 'pakārakatve varteta //6//
GE07bhg4c06u:197: kīdṛśasya sa ripur ity apekṣāyām āha bandhur iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:198: yenātmanā jīvenātmā mana eva jitas tasya jīvasya sa ātmā mano bandhus tad-upakārī /
GE07bhg4c06u:199: anātmano 'jita-manasas tu jīvasyātmaiva mana eva śatruvat śatrutve 'pakārakatve varteta //6//
GE07bhg4c06u:203: śrīdharaḥ : jitātmanaḥ svasmin bandhutvaṃ sphuṭayati jitātmana iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:204: jita ātmā yena tasya praśāntasya rāgādi-rahitasyaiva /
GE07bhg4c06u:205: paraṃ kevalam ātmā śītoṣṇādiṣu satsv api samāhitaḥ svātma-niṣṭho bhavati nānyasya /
GE07bhg4c06u:206: yad vā tasya hṛdi paramātmā samāhitaḥ sthito bhavati //7//
GE07bhg4c06u:209: śītoṣṇa-sukha-duḥkheṣu citta-vikṣepa-kareṣu satsv api tathā mānāpamānayoḥ pūjā-paribhavayoś citta-vikṣepa-hetvoḥ sator iti teṣu samatveneti vā /
GE07bhg4c06u:210: jitātmanaḥ prāg-uktasya jitendriyasya praśāntasya sarvatra sama-buddhayā rāga-dveṣa-śūnyasya paramātmā sva-prakāśa-jñāna-svabhāva ātmā samāhitaḥ samādhi-viṣayo yogārūḍho bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:212: jitātmanaḥ praśāntasyaiva paraṃ kevalam ātmā samāhito bhavati nānyasya /
GE07bhg4c06u:213: tasmāj jitātmā praśāntaś ca bhaved ity arthaḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c06u:216: jitātmano jita-manasaḥ praśāntasya rāgādi-rahitasya yoginaḥ param atiśayena samāhitaḥ samādhi-stha ātmā bhavet /
GE07bhg4c06u:217: śītādiṣu satsv api mānāpamānayoḥ prāptayor api //7//
GE07bhg4c06u:218: baladevaḥ : yogārambha-yogyām avasthām āha jiteti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:219: śītoṣṇādiṣu mānāpamānayoś ca jitātmano 'vikṛta-manasaḥ praśāntasya rāgādi-śūnyasyātmā param atyarthaṃ samāhitaḥ samādhistho bhavati //7//
GE07bhg4c06u:223: śrīdharaḥ : yogārūḍhasya lakṣaṇaṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ coktam upapādya upasaṃharati jñāneti /
GE07bhg4c06u:224: jñānam aupadeśikaṃ vijñānam aparokṣānubhavaḥ tābhyāṃ tṛpto nirākāṅkṣa ātmā cittaṃ yasya /
GE07bhg4c06u:232: jñānaṃ śāstroktānāṃ padārthānām aupadeśikaṃ jñānaṃ vijñānaṃ tad-aprāmāṇya-śaṅkā-nirākaraṇa-phalena
GE07bhg4c06u:233: vicāreṇa tathaiva teṣāṃ svānubhavenāparokṣīkaraṇaṃ tābhyāḥ tṛptaḥ saṃjātālaṃ-pratyaya
GE07bhg4c06u:236: ataeva vijitāni rāga-dveṣa-pūrvakād viṣaya-grahaṇādvayāvartitānīndriyāṇi yena saḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:237: ataeva heyopādeya-buddhi-śūnyatvena samāni mṛt-piṇḍa-pāṣāṇa-kāñcanāni yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:238: yogī paramahaṃsa-parivrājakaḥ para-vairāgya-yukto yogārūḍha ity ucyate //8//
GE07bhg4c06u:240: jñānam aupadeśikaṃ vijñānam aparokṣānubhavas tābhyāṃ tṛpto nirākāṅkṣa ātmā cittaṃ yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:241: kūṭastha ekenaiva svabhāvena sarva-kālaṃ vyāpya sthitaḥ sarva-vastuṣv anāsaktatvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:245: jñānam śāstrajaṃ vijñānam viviktātmānubhavas tābhyāṃ tṛptātmā pūrṇa-manāḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:250: īdṛśo yogī niṣkāma-karmī yukta ātma-darśana-rūpa-yogābhyāsa-yogya ucyate //8//
GE07bhg4c06u:253: sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu sama-buddhir viśiṣyate //9//
GE07bhg4c06u:254: śrīdharaḥ : suhṛn-mitrādiṣu sama-buddhi-yuktas tu tato 'pi śreṣṭha ity āha suhṛd iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:264: eteṣu samā rāga-dveṣādi-śūnyā buddhir yasya sa tu viśiṣṭaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c06u:266: suhṛn-mitrādiṣu sama-buddhis tu sarva-yogi-śreṣṭha ity āha suhṛd iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:267: suhṛt pratyupakāram anapekṣya pūrva-snehaṃ sambandhaṃ ca vinaivopakartā /
GE07bhg4c06u:274: eteṣu sādhuṣu śāstra-vihita-kāriṣu pāpeṣu śāstra-pratiṣiddha-kāriṣv api /
GE07bhg4c06u:275: ca-kārād anyeṣu ca sarveṣu sama-buddhiḥ kaḥ kīdṛk-karmety avyāpṛta-buddhiḥ sarvatra rāga-dveṣa-śūnyao viśiṣyate sarvatra utkṛṣṭo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:291: sa sama-loṣṭāśma-kāñcanād api yoginaḥ sakāśād viśiṣyate śreṣṭho bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:302: yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:304: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ yogārūḍhasya lakṣaṇam uktvedānīṃ tasya sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ vidhatte yogīty ādinā sa yogī paramo mata ity antena granthena yogīti /
GE07bhg4c06u:311: yataṃ saṃyataṃ cittam ātmā dehaś ca yasya /
GE07bhg4c06u:315: evaṃ yogārūḍhasya lakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ coktvā tasya sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ vidhatte yogīty ādibhiḥ sa yogī paramo mata ity antais trayoviṃśatyā ślokaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:317: yogī yogārūḍha ātmānaṃ cittaṃ satataṃ nirantaraṃ yuñjīta kṣiptam ūḍha-vikṣipta-bhūmi-parityāgenaikāgra-nirodha-bhūmibhyāṃ samāhitaṃ kuryāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:318: rahasi giri-guhādau yoga-pratibandhaka-durjanādi-varjite deśe sthita ekākī tyakta-sarva-gṛha-parijanaḥ saṃnyāsī /
GE07bhg4c06u:319: cittam antaḥ-karaṇam ātmā dehaś ca saṃyatau yoga-pratibandhaka-vyāpāra-śūnyau yasya sa yata-cittātmā /
GE07bhg4c06u:321: ataeva cāparigrahaḥ śāstrābhyanujñātenāpi yoga-pratibandhakena parigraheṇa śūnyaḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c06u:323: atha sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ vidhatte yogīty ādinā sa yogī paramo mata ity atas tena /
GE07bhg4c06u:324: yogī yogārūḍha ātmānaṃ mano yuñjīta samādhi-yuktaṃ kuryāt //10//
GE07bhg4c06u:325: baladevaḥ : atha tasya sāṅgaṃ yogam upadiśati yogīty ādi trayoviṃśatyā /
GE07bhg4c06u:327: ātmānaṃ manaḥ satatam aharahar yuñjīta samādhi-yuktaṃ kuryāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:329: tatrāpy ekākī dvitīya-śūnyas tatrāpi yata-cittātmā yatau yoga-pratikūla-vyāpāra-varjitau citta-dehau yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:333: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:337: śrīdharaḥ : āsana-niyamaṃ darśayann āha śucāv iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:338: śuddhe sthāne ātmanaḥ svasya āsanaṃ sthāpayitvā /
GE07bhg4c06u:345: kuśānām upari carma tad upari vastram āstīryetety arthaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c06u:346: tatreti / tatra tasminn āsana upaviśyaikāgraṃ vikṣepa-rahitaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā yogaṃ yuñjyād abhyaset /
GE07bhg4c06u:347: yatāḥ saṃyatāś cittasyendriyāṇāṃ ca kriyā yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:350: tatrāsana-niyamaṃ darśayann āha śucau deśa iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:351: śucau svabhāvataḥ saṃskārato vā śuddhe jana-samudāya-rahite nirbhaye gaṅgā-taṭa-guhādau
GE07bhg4c06u:352: deśe sthāne pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram niścalam nātyucchritaṃ nātyuccaṃ nāpy atinīcam cailājina-kuśottaraṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:353: cailaṃ mṛdu-vastram ajinaṃ mṛdu-vyāghrādi-carma te kuśebhya uttare uparitane yasmiṃs tat /
GE07bhg4c06u:354: āsyate 'sminn ity āsanaṃ kuśamaya-vṛṣy-upari mṛdu-carma tad-upari mṛdu-vastra-rūpam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:355: tathā cāha bhagavān patañjaliḥ sthira-sukham āsanam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:356: ātmana iti parāsana-vyāvṛtty-arthaṃ tasyāpi parecchā-niyamābhāvena yoga-vikṣepa-paratvāt //11//
GE07bhg4c06u:357: evam āsanaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya kim kuryād iti tatrāha tatraikāgram iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:358: tatra tasminn āsana upaviśyaiva na tu śayānas tiṣṭhan vā /
GE07bhg4c06u:360: yatāḥ saṃyatā uparatāś cittasyendriyāṇāṃ ca kriyā vṛttayo yena sa yata-cittendriya-kriyaḥ san yogaṃ samādhiṃ yuñjītābhyaset /
GE07bhg4c06u:362: dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣma-darśibhiḥ [KaṭhU 1.3.12] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:363: kiṃ kṛtvā yogam abhyased iti tatrāha ekāgraṃ rājasatāmasa-vyutthānākhya-prāg-ukta-bhūmi-traya-parityāgenaika-viṣayaka-dhārāvāhikāneka-vṛtti-yuktam
GE07bhg4c06u:364: udrikta-sattvaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā dṛḍha-bhūmikena prayatnena sampādyaikāgratā-vivṛddhy-arthaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:366: sa ca brahmākāra-mano-vṛtti-pravāha eva nididhyāsanākhyaḥ / tad uktam -
GE07bhg4c06u:369: etad evābhipretya dhyānābhyāsa-prakarṣaṃ vidadhe bhagavān - yogī yuñjīta satataṃ [Gītā 6.10] yuñjyād yogam ātma-viśuddhaye [Gītā 6.12] /
GE07bhg4c06u:375: ātmano 'ntaḥ-karaṇasya viśuddhatve vikṣepa-śūnyatvenātisūkṣmatayā brahma-sākṣātkāra-yogyatāyai dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā [KaṭhU 1.3.12] iti śruteḥ //11-12//
GE07bhg4c06u:376: baladevaḥ : āsanam āha śucāv iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:377: śucau svataḥ saṃskārataś ca śuddhe gaṅgā-taṭa-giri-guhādau deśe sthiraṃ niścalam /
GE07bhg4c06u:384: ātmana iti parāsanasya vyāvṛttaye parecchāyau aniyatatvena tasya yoga-pratikūlatvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:386: na tu tiṣṭhan śayāno vety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:387: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ -- āsīnaḥ sambhavāt [Vs 4.1.7] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:388: yatā niruddhāś cittādi-kriyā yasya saḥ mana ekāgram avyākulaṃ kṛtvā yogaṃ yuñjīta samādhim abhyaset /
GE07bhg4c06u:389: ātmano 'ntaḥkaraṇasya viśuddhaye atinairmalyena saukṣmyeṇātma-darśana-yogyatāyai dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā
GE07bhg4c06u:395: manaḥ saṃyamya mac-citto yukta āsīta mat-paraḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c06u:396: śrīdharaḥ : cittaikāgryāpayoginīṃ dehādhikāriṇāṃ darśayann āha samam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:398: kāyaś ca śiraś ca grīvā ca kāya-śiro-grīvam /
GE07bhg4c06u:403: svīyaṃ nāsikāgraṃ samprekṣya ity ardha-nimīlita-netra ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:404: itas tato diśaś cānavalokayan āsīta ity uttareṇānvayaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c06u:411: aham eva paraṃ puruṣārtho yasya sa mat-paraḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:414: tad-arthaṃ bāhyam āsanam uktvādhunā tatra kathaṃ śarīra-dhāraṇam ity ucyate samam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:415: kāyaḥ śarīra-madhyaṃ sa ca śiraś ca grīvā ca kāya-śiro-grīvaṃ mūlādhārād ārabhya
GE07bhg4c06u:416: mūrdhānta-paryantaṃ samam avakram acalam akampaṃ dhārayann eka-tattvābhyāsena vikṣepa-saha-bhāvya-aṅgam
GE07bhg4c06u:418: kiṃ ca svaṃ svīyaṃ nāsikāgraṃ saṃprekṣyaiva laya-vikṣepa-rāhityāya viṣaya-pravṛtti-rahito 'nimīlita-netra ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:419: diśaś cānavalokayann antarāntarā diśāṃ cāvalokanam akurvan yoga-pratibandhakatvāt tasya /
GE07bhg4c06u:422: nidāna-nivṛtti-rūpeṇa prakarṣeṇa śānto rāgādi-doṣa-rahita ātmāntaḥkaraṇaṃ yasya sa praśāntātmā śāstrīya-niścaya-dārḍhyād vigatā bhīḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:426: mayi parameśvare pratyak-citi sa-guṇe nirguṇe vā cittaṃ yasya sa mac-citto mad-viṣayaka-dhārāvāhika-citta-vṛttimān /
GE07bhg4c06u:427: putrādau priye cintanīye sati katham evaṃ syād ata āha mat-paraḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:428: aham eva paramānanda-rūpatvāt paraḥ puruṣārthaḥ priyo yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c06u:429: tad etat preyaḥ putrāt preyo vittāt preyo 'nyasmāt sarvasmād antarataraṃ yad ayam ātmā [BAU 1.4.8] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:432: na tu svecchayā vyuttiṣṭhed ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:433: bhavati kaścid rāgī strī-citto na tu striyam eva paratvenārādhyatvena gṛhṇāti /
GE07bhg4c06u:434: kiṃ tarhi ? rājānaṃ vā devaṃ vā /
GE07bhg4c06u:435: ayaṃ tu mac-citto mat-paraś ca sarvārādhyatvena mām eva manyata iti bhāṣya-kṛtāṃ vyākhyā /
GE07bhg4c06u:439: kāyo deha-madhya-bhāgaḥ samam avakram acalaṃ niścalaṃ dhārayan kurvan manaḥ saṃyamya pratyāhṛtya mac-citto māṃ caturbhujaṃ sundarākāraṃ cintayan
GE07bhg4c06u:441: baladevaḥ : āsane tasminn upaviṣṭasya śarīra-dhāraṇa-vidhim āha samam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:443: kāyaś ca śiraś ca grīvā ca teṣāṃ samāhāraḥ prāṇy-aṅgatvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:446: sthiro dṛḍha-prayatno bhūtvā sva-nāsikāgraṃ samprekṣya sampaśyan mano-laya-vikṣepa-nivṛttaye bhrū-madhya-dṛṣṭiḥ sann ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:458: śrīdharaḥ : yogābhyāsa-phalam āha yuñjann evam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:459: evam ukta-prakāreṇa sadātmānaṃ mano yuñjan samāhitaṃ kurvan /
GE07bhg4c06u:460: niyataṃ niruddhaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:466: evaṃ saṃprajñāta-samādhināsīnasya kiṃ syād ity ucyate yuñjann iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:468: samāhitaṃ kurvan yogī sadā yogābhyāsa-paro 'bhāysātiśayena niyataṃ niruddhaṃ mānasaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:469: mano yena niyatā niruddhā mānasā mano-vṛtti-rūpā vikārā yeneti vā niyata-mānasaḥ san,
GE07bhg4c06u:473: na tu sāṃsārikāṇy aiśvaryāṇi anātma-viṣaya-samādhi-phalāny adhigacchati,
GE07bhg4c06u:475: tathā ca tat-tat-samādhi-phalāny uktvāha bhagavān patañjaliḥ -- te samādhāv upasargā vyutthāne siddhayaḥ [YogaS 3.37] iti,
GE07bhg4c06u:476: sthāny-upanimantraṇe saṅga-smayākaraṇaṃ punaḥ aniṣṭa-prasaṅgāt [YogaS 3.51] iti ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:478: tathā coddālako devair āmantrito 'pi tatra saṅgam ādaraṃ smayaṃ garvaṃ cākṛtvā devān
GE07bhg4c06u:479: avajñāya punar aniṣṭa-prasaṅga-nivāraṇāya nirvikalpakam eva samādhim akarod iti vasiṣṭhenopākhyāyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:480: mumukṣubhir heyaś ca samādhiḥ sūtritaḥ patañjalinā -- vitarka-vicārānandāsmitā-rūpānugamāt saṃprajñātaḥ [YogaS 1.17] /
GE07bhg4c06u:481: samyak saṃśaya-viparyayānadhyavasāya-rahitatvena prajñāyate prakarṣeṇa viśeṣa-rūpeṇa jñāyate bhāvyasya rūpaṃ yena sa samprajñātaḥ samādhir bhāvanā-viśeṣaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:482: bhāvanā hi bhāvyasya viṣayāntara-parihāreṇa cetasi punaḥ punar niveśanam /
GE07bhg4c06u:485: tad uktaṃ -- kṣīṇa-vṛtter abhijātasyeva maṇer grahītṛ-grahaṇa-grāhyeṣu tat-stha-tad-añjanatā-samāpattiḥ [YogaS 1.41] /
GE07bhg4c06u:486: kṣīṇā rājasa-tāmasa-vṛttayo yasya tasya cittasya grahītṛ-grahaṇa-grāhyeṣv ātmendriya-viṣayeṣu tat-sthatā tatraivaikāgratā /
GE07bhg4c06u:491: evaṃ nirmalasya cittasya tat-tad-bhāvanīya-vastūparāgāt tat-tad-rūpāpattiḥ samāpattiḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:493: yadyapi garhītṛ-grahaṇa-grāhyeṣv ity uktaṃ tathāpi bhūmikā-krama-vaśād grāhya-grahaṇa-grahītṛṣv iti boddhavyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:494: yataḥ prathamaṃ grāhya-niṣṭha eva samādhir bhavati tato grahaṇa-niṣṭhas tato grahītṛ-niṣṭha iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:496: tatra yadā sthūlaṃ mahā-bhūtendriyātmaka-ṣoḍaśa-vikāra-rūpaṃ viṣayam ādāya pūrvāparānusandhānena śabdārthollekhena ca bhāvanā kriyate tadā sa-vitarkaḥ samādhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:497: asminn evālambate pūrvāparānusandhāna-śabdārthollekha-śūnyatvena yadā bhāvanā pravartate tadā nirvitarkaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:500: deśa-kāla-dharmāvacchedena yadā bhāvanā pravartate tadā sa-vicāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:501: asminn evālambane deśa-kāla-dharmāvacchedaṃ vinā dharmi-mātrāvabhāsitvena yadā bhāvanā pravartate tadā nirvicāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:503: tathā ca bhāṣyaṃ vitarkaś cittasya sthūla ālambana ābhogaḥ sūkṣme vicāra iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:506: bhāvyate tadā guṇa-bhāvāc cic-chakteḥ sukha-prakāśamayasya sattvasya bhāvayamānasyodrekātmānanadaḥ samādhir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:507: asminn eva samādhau ye baddha-dhṛtayas tattvāntaraṃ pradhāna-puruṣa-rūpaṃ na paśyanti te vigata-dehāhaṅkāratvād videha-śabdenocyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:509: tataḥ paraṃ rajas-tamo-leśānabhibhūtaṃ śuddhaṃ sattvam ālambanīkṛtya yā bhāvanā pravartate
GE07bhg4c06u:510: tasyāṃ grāhyasya sattvasya nyag-bhāvāc citi-śakter udrekāt sattā-mātrāvaśeṣatvena
GE07bhg4c06u:513: yato yatrāntaḥkaraṇam ahim ity ullekhena viṣayān vedayate so 'haṅkāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:514: yatra tv antarmukhatayā pratiloma-pariṇāmena prakṛti-līne cetasi sattā-mātram avabhāti so 'smitā /
GE07bhg4c06u:515: asminn eva samādhau ye kṛta-paritoṣās te paraṃ puruṣam apaśyantaś
GE07bhg4c06u:516: cetasaḥ prakṛtau līnatvāt prakṛti-layā ity ucyante /
GE07bhg4c06u:518: ye tu paraṃ puruṣaṃ vivicya bhāvanāyāṃ pravartante teṣām api kevala-puruṣa-viṣayā viveka-khyātir grahītṛ-samāpattir api na sāsmitaḥ samādhir vivekenāsmitāyās tyāgāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:519: tatra grahītṛ-bhāna-pūrvakam eva grahaṇa-bhānaṃ tat-pūrvakaṃ ca sūkṣma-grāhya-bhānaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:520: tat-pūrvakaṃ ca sthūla-grāhya-bhānam iti sthūla-viṣayo dvi-vidho 'pi vitarkaś catuṣṭayānugataḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:523: caturtho vitarka-vicārānandair vikalo 'smitā-mātra iti caturavastho 'yaṃ samprajñāta iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:524: evaṃ sa-vitarkaḥ sa-vicāraḥ sānandaḥ sāsmitaś ca samādhir antardhānādi-siddhi-hetutayā mukti-hetu-samādhi-virodhitvād dheya eva mumukṣubhiḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:525: grahītṛ-grahaṇayor api citta-vṛtti-viṣayatā-daśāyāṃ grāhya-koṭau nikṣepād dheyopādeya-vibhāga-kathanāya grāhya-samāpattir eva vivṛtā sūtra-kāreṇa
GE07bhg4c06u:526: catur-vidhā hi grāhya-samāpattiḥ sthūla-grāhya-gocarā dvividhā sa-vitarkā nirvitarkā ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:529: tatra śabdārtha-jñāna-vikalpaiḥ saṃkīrṇā savitarkā samāpattiḥ [YogaS 1.42] śabdārtha-jñāna-vikalpa-sambhinnā
GE07bhg4c06u:530: sthūlārthāvabhāsa-rūpā savitarkā samāpattiḥ sthūla-gocarā savikalpaka-vṛttir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:533: nyag-bhūta-jñānāṃśatvena svarūpa-śūnyeva nirvitarkā samāpattiḥ sthūla-gocarā nirvikalpaka-vṛttir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:534: etayaiva savicārā nirvicārā ca sūkṣma-viṣayā vyākhyātā [YogaS 1.44] sūkṣmas tan-mātrādir
GE07bhg4c06u:535: viṣayo yasyāḥ sā sūkṣma-viṣayā samāpattir dvividhā sa-vicārā nirvicārā ca savikalpaka-nirvikalpaka-bhedena /
GE07bhg4c06u:536: etayaiva savitarkayā nirvitarkayā ca sthūla-viṣayayā samāpattyā vyākhyātā /
GE07bhg4c06u:537: śabdārtha-jñāna-vikalpa-sahitatvena deśa-kāla-dharmādy-avacchinnaḥ sūkṣmo 'rthaḥ pratibhāti yasyāṃ sā sa-vicārā /
GE07bhg4c06u:540: sūkṣma-viṣayatvaṃ cāliṅga-paryavasānam [YogaS 1.45] sa-vicārāyā nirvicārāyāś ca samāpatter yat sūkṣma-viṣayatvam uktaṃ tad-aliṅga-paryantaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:541: tena sānanda-sāsmitayor grahitṛ-grahaṇa-samāpattyor api grāhya-samāpattāv evāntar-bhāva ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:542: tathā hi - pārthivasyāṇor gandha-tanmātraṃ sūkṣmo viṣayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:547: teṣām ahaṅkāras tasya liṅga-mātraṃ mahat-tattvaṃ tasyāpy aliṅgaṃ pradhānaṃ sūkṣmo viṣayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:548: saptānām api prakṛtīnāṃ pradhāna eva sūkṣmatā-viśrāntes tat-paryantam eva sūkṣma-viṣayatvam uktam /
GE07bhg4c06u:549: yadyapi pradhānād api puruṣaḥ sūkṣmo 'sti tathāpy anvayi-kāraṇatvābhāvāt tasya sarvānvayi-kāraṇe pradhāna
GE07bhg4c06u:551: puruṣas tu nimitta-kāraṇaṃ sad api nānanvayi-kāraṇatvena sūkṣmatām arhati /
GE07bhg4c06u:552: anvayi-kāraṇatva-vivakṣāyāṃ tu puruṣo 'pi sūkṣmo bhavaty eveti draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:553: tā eva sa-bījaḥ samādhiḥ [YogaS 1.46] tāś catasraḥ samāpattayo grāhyeṇa bījena saha vartanta iti sa-bījaḥ samādhir vitarka-vicārānandāsmitānugamāt samprajñāta iti prāg uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:561: tatra pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ nirvicārārthatvān nirvicāra-phalenaiva phalavattvam /
GE07bhg4c06u:563: saty adhyātma-prasādaḥ kleśa-vāsanā-rahitasya cittasya bhūtārtha-viṣayaḥ kramānanurodhī
GE07bhg4c06u:567: bhūmiṣṭhān iva śailasthaḥ sarvān prājño 'nupaśyati // iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:568: ṛtaṃbharā tatra prajñā [YogaS 1.48] tatra tasmin prajñā-prasāde sati samāhita-cittasya yogino yā prajñā jāyate sā ṛtam-bharā /
GE07bhg4c06u:569: ṛtaṃ satyam eva bibharti na tatra viparyāsa-gandho 'py astīti yogikyeveyaṃ samākhyā /
GE07bhg4c06u:573: tridhā prakalpayan prajñāṃ labhate yogam uttamam // iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:576: na hi viśeṣeṇa saha kasyacic chabdasya saṅgatir grahītuṃ śakyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:578: na hi viśeṣeṇa saha kasyacid vyāptir grahītuṃ śakyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:579: tasmāc chrutānumāna-viṣayo na viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti /
GE07bhg4c06u:580: na cāsya sūkṣma-vyavahita-viprakṛṣṭasya vastuno loka-pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam asti /
GE07bhg4c06u:581: kiṃ tu samādhi-prajñā-nirgrāhya eva sa viśeṣo bhavati bhūta-sūkṣma-gato vā puruṣa-gato vā /
GE07bhg4c06u:583: eva prajñāyāṃ yoginā mahān prayatna āstheya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:585: saṃskārāṇāṃ sad-bhāvāt taiś cālyamānasya cittasya kathaṃ nirvicāra-vaiśāradya-pūrvakādhyātma-prasāda-labhya-rtambharā
GE07bhg4c06u:586: prajñā pratiṣṭhitā syād ata āha -- taj-jaḥ saṃskāro 'nya-saṃskāra-pratibandhī [YogaS
GE07bhg4c06u:587: 1.50] tayā ṛtambharayā prajñayā janito yaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa tattva-viṣayayā prajñayā
GE07bhg4c06u:588: janitatvena balavattvād anyān vyutthānajān samādhijāṃś ca saṃskārān atattva-viṣaya-prajñā-janitatvena
GE07bhg4c06u:589: durbalān pratibadhnāti sva-kāryākṣamān karoti nāśyatīti vā /
GE07bhg4c06u:590: teṣāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhibhavāt tat-prabhavāḥ pratyayā na bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c06u:593: tataḥ prajñā-kṛtāḥ saṃskārā iti navo navaḥ saṃskārāśayo vardhate
GE07bhg4c06u:597: saṃskāraiḥ pratibandhas teṣāṃ tu saṃskārāṇāṃ pratibandhakābhāvād ekāgra-bhūmāv eva
GE07bhg4c06u:598: sa-bījaḥ samādhiḥ syān na tu nirbījo nirodha-bhūmāv iti tatrāha -- tasyāpi nirodhe
GE07bhg4c06u:599: sarva-nirodhān nirbījaḥ samādhiḥ [YogaS 1.51] tasya samprajñātasya samādher ekāgra-bhūmijasya /
GE07bhg4c06u:600: api-śabdāt kṣipta-mūḍha-vikṣiptānām api nirodhe yogi-prayatna-viśeṣeṇa vilaye sati
GE07bhg4c06u:601: sarva-nirodhāt samādheḥ samādhijasya saṃskārasyāpi nirodhān nirbījo nirālambano 'saṃprajñāta-samādhir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:602: sa ca sopāyaḥ prāk sūtritaḥ -- virāma-pratyayābhyāsa-pūrvaḥ saṃskāra-śeṣo 'nyaḥ [YogaS 1.18] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:604: / tasya pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ paraṃ vairāgyam iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c06u:605: virāmaś cāsau pratyayaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣa iti vā /
GE07bhg4c06u:606: tasyābhyāsaḥ paunaḥpunyena cetasi niveśanaṃ tad eva pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasya sa tathā
GE07bhg4c06u:607: saṃskāra-mātra-śeṣaḥ sarvathā nivṛttiko 'nyaḥ pūrvoktāt sa-bījād vilakṣaṇo nirbījo
GE07bhg4c06u:609: asamprajñātasya hi samādher dvāv upāyāv uktāv abhyāso vairāgyaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:610: tatra sālambanatvād abhyāsasya na nirālambana-samādhi-hetutvaṃ ghaṭata iti nirālambanaṃ paraṃ vairāgyam eva hetutvenocyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:613: dhāraṇā-dhyāna-samādhi-rūpaṃ sādhana-trayaṃ yama-niyamāsana-prāṇāyāma-pratyāhāra-rūpa-sādhana-pañcakāpekṣayā sa-bījasya samādher antaraṅgaṃ sādhanam /
GE07bhg4c06u:617: nirbījasya tu samādhes tad api trayaṃ bahiraṅgaṃ paramparayopakāri tasya tu paraṃ vairāgyam evāntaraṅgam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:618: ayam api dvividho bhava-pratyaya upāya-pratyayaś ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:620: videhānāṃ sānandānāṃ prakṛti-layānāṃ ca sāsmitānāṃ daivānāṃ prāg-vyākhyātānāṃ janma-viśeṣād auṣadhi-viśeṣān mantra-viśeṣāt tapo-viśeṣād vā yaḥ samādhiḥ sa bhava-pratyayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:621: bhavaḥ saṃsāra ātmānātma-vivekābhāva-rūpaḥ pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c06u:623: punaḥ saṃsāra-hetutvān mumukṣubhir heya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:625: janmauṣadhi-mantra-tapaḥ-siddha-vyatiriktānām ātmānātma-viveka-darśināṃ tu yaḥ samādhiḥ sa śraddhā-pūrvakaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:626: śraddhādayaḥ pūrva upāyā yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c06u:630: tataḥ śraddadhānasya vivekārthino vīryam utsāha upajāyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:632: tat-smaraṇāc ca cittam anākulaṃ sat samādhīyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:635: tad-abhyāsāt parāc ca vairāgyād bhavaty asamprajñātaḥ samādhir mumukṣūṇām ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:636: pratikṣaṇa-pariṇāmino hi bhāvā ṛte citi-śakteḥ iti nyāyena tasyām api sarva-vṛtti-nirodhāvasthāyāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:637: citta-pariṇāma-pravāhas taj-janya-saṃskāra-pravāhaś ca bhavaty evety abhipretya saṃskāra-viśeṣa ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c06u:638: tasya ca saṃskārasya prayojanam uktam -- tataḥ praśānta-vāhitā saṃskārāt [YogaS 3.10] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:642: uttarottara-kṣaṇeṣu tv adhikam adhikaṃ śāmyatīti krameṇa śāntir vardhate /
GE07bhg4c06u:645: tadā ca nirindhanāgnivac cittaṃ krameṇopaśāmyad-vyutthāna-samādhi-nirodha-saṃskāraiḥ saha svasyāṃ prakṛtau līyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:646: tadā ca samādhi-paripāka-prabhavena vedānta-vākyajena samyag-darśanenāvidyāyāṃ nivṛttāyāṃ tad-dhetuka-dṛg-dṛśya-saṃyogābhāvād vṛttau pañca-vidhāyām
GE07bhg4c06u:647: api nivṛttāyāṃ svarūpa-pratiṣṭhaḥ puruṣaḥ śuddhaḥ kevalo mukta ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:648: tad uktaṃ -- tadā draṣṭuḥ svarūpe 'vasthānam [YogaS 1.3] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:650: vṛtti-daśāyāṃ tu nityāpariṇāmi-caitanya-rūpatvena tasya sarvadām śuddhatve 'py anādinā
GE07bhg4c06u:655: etad eva vivṛttaṃ draṣṭṛ-dṛśyoparaktaṃ cittaṃ sarvārtham [YogaS 4.23] cittam eva
GE07bhg4c06u:657: apy aviṣayātmakam ivācetanam api cetanam iva sphaṭika-maṇi-kalpaṃ sarvārtham ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:658: tad anena citta-sārūpyeṇa bhrāntāḥ kecit tad eva cetanam ity āhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:660: yasya bhogāpavargārthaṃ tat sa eva paraś cetano 'saṃhataḥ puruṣo na tu ghaṭādivat saṃhatya-kāri cittaṃ cetanam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:662: evaṃ yo 'ntaḥ-karaṇa-puruṣayor viśeṣa-darśī tasya yāntaḥ-karaṇe prāg-aviveka-vaśād ātma-bhāva-bhāvanāsīt
GE07bhg4c06u:667: yathā prāvṛṣi tṛṇāṅkurasyodbhedena tad-bīja-sattānumīyate thatā mokṣa-mārga-śravaṇena
GE07bhg4c06u:668: siddhānta-ruci-vaśād yasya lomaharṣāśru-pātau dṛśyete tatrāpy asti viśeṣa-darśana-bījam
GE07bhg4c06u:670: yasya tu tādṛśaṃ karma-bījaṃ nāsti tasya mokṣa-mārga-śravaṇe pūrva-pakṣa-yuktiṣu rucir bhavaty aruciś ca siddhānta-yuktiṣu /
GE07bhg4c06u:671: tasya ko 'ham āsaṃ katham aham āsam ity ādir ātma-bhāva-bhāvanā svābhāvikī pravartate /
GE07bhg4c06u:673: evaṃ sati kiṃ syād iti tad āha -- tadā viveka-nimnaṃ kaivalya-prāg-bhāraṃ cittam [YogaS 4.26] /
GE07bhg4c06u:676: cittaṃ ca sarvadā pravartamāna-vṛtti-pravāheṇa pravahaj-jala-tulyaṃ tat prāg-ātmānātmāviveka-rūpa-vimārga-vāhi-viṣaya-bhoga-paryantam asyāsīt
GE07bhg4c06u:678: asmiṃś ca viveka-vāhini citte ye 'ntarāyās te sa-hetukā nivartanīyā ity āha sūtrābhyām -- tac-chidreṣu pratyayāntarāṇi saṃskārebhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:680: tasmin viveka-vāhini citte chidreṣv antarāleṣu pratyayāntarāṇi vyutthāna-rūpāṇy ahaṃ mamety evaṃrūpāṇi vyutthānānubhavajebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ kṣīyamāṇbhyo 'pi prādurbhavanti /
GE07bhg4c06u:683: yathā kleśā avidyādayo jñānāgninā dagdha-bīja-bhāvā ca punaś citta-bhūmau prarohaṃ prāpnuvanti tathā jñānāgninā dagdha-bīja-bhāvāḥ saṃskārāḥ pratyayāntarāṇi na praroḍhum arhanti /
GE07bhg4c06u:684: jñānāgni-saṃskārās tu yāvac cittam anuśerata iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:685: evaṃ ca pratyayāntarānudayena viveka-vāhini citte sthirībhūte sati prasaṃkhyāne 'py
GE07bhg4c06u:688: tatra buddheḥ sāttvike pariṇāme kṛta-saṃyamasya sarveṣāṃ guṇa-pariṇāmānāṃ svāmivad
GE07bhg4c06u:689: ākramaṇaṃ sarvādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ teṣām eva ca śāntoditāvyapadeśya-dharmitvena sthitānāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:690: yathāvad viveka-jñānaṃ sarva-jñātṛtvaṃ ca viśokā nāma siddhiḥ phalaṃ tad-vairāgyāc
GE07bhg4c06u:692: sarva-jñātṛtvaṃ ca [YogaS 3.49] sattva-puruṣayoḥ śuddhi-sāmye kaivalyam [YogaS 3.55] iti sūtrābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:693: tad etad ucyate tasmin prasaṅkhyāne saty apy akusīdasya phalam alipsoḥ pratyayāntarāṇām
GE07bhg4c06u:694: anudaye sarva-prakārair viveka-khyāteḥ paripoṣād dharma-meghaḥ samādhir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:696: ayaṃ tu paramo dharmo yad yogenātma-darśanam // iti smṛteḥ //
GE07bhg4c06u:697: dharmaṃ pratyag-brahmaikya-sākṣātkāraṃ mehati siñcatīti dharma-meghas tattva-sākṣātkāra-hetur ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:699: tato dharma-meghāt samādher dharmād vā kleśānāṃ pañca-vidhānām avidyāsmitā-rāga-dveṣābhiniveśānāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:700: karmaṇāṃ ca kṛṣṇa-śuklakṛṣṇa-śukla-bhedena trividhānām avidyā-mūlānām avidyā-kṣaye
GE07bhg4c06u:702: kāraṇa-nivṛttyā kārya-nivṛtter ātyantikyā ucitatvād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:703: evaṃ sthite yuñjann eva sadātmānam ity anena samprajñātaḥ samādhir ekāgra-bhūmāv uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:704: niyata-mānasa ity anena tat-phala-bhūto 'samprajñāta-samādhir nirodha-bhūmāv uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:706: nirvāṇa-paramam iti dharma-meghasya samādhes tattva-jñāna-dvārā kaivalya-hetutvaṃ,
GE07bhg4c06u:708: yasmād evaṃ mahā-phalo yogas tasmāt taṃ mahatā prayatnena sampādayed ity abhiprāyaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c06u:712: nirvāṇo mokṣa eva paramaḥ prāpyo yasyāṃ mayy eva nirviśeṣa-brahmaṇi samyak sthā sthitir yasyāṃ tāṃ śāntiṃ saṃsāroparatiṃ prāpnoti //15//
GE07bhg4c06u:713: baladevaḥ : evam āsīnasya kiṃ syāt tad āha yuñjann iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:714: yogī sadā pratidinam ātmānaṃ yuñjann arpayan /
GE07bhg4c06u:715: niyata-mānasaḥ mat-sparśa-pariśuddhatayā niyataṃ niścalaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ yasya sa,
GE07bhg4c06u:716: mat-saṃsthāṃ mad-adhīnāṃ nirvāṇa-paramāṃ śāntim adhigacchati labhate /
GE07bhg4c06u:717: tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti [ŚvetU 3.8] ity ādi śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:718: nirvāṇa-paramāṃ mokṣāvadhikām iti siddhayo 'pi yoga-phalānīty uktam //15//
GE07bhg4c06u:720: nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti na caikāntam anaśnataḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:722: śrīdharaḥ : yogābhyāsa-niṣṭhasyāhārādi-niyamam āha nātyaśanata iti dvyābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:723: atyantam adhikaṃ bhuñjānasya ekāntam atyantam abhuñjānasyāpi yogaḥ samādhir na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:726: evaṃ yogābhyāsa-niṣṭhasyāhārādi-niyamam āha nātyaśanata iti dvyābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:727: yad bhuktaṃ sajjīryati śarīrasya ca kārya-kṣamatāṃ sampādayati tad-ātma-saṃmitam annaṃ tad atikramya lobhenādhikam aśnato na yogo 'sti ajīrṇa-doṣeṇa vyādhi-pīḍitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:729: anāhārād atyalpāhārād vā rasa-poṣaṇābhāvena śarīrasya kāryākṣamatvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:730: yad u ha vā ātma-saṃmitam annaṃ tad avati tan na hinasti yad bhūyo hinasti tad yat kanīyo 'nnaṃ na tad avati [ŚatapathaB 9.2.1.2] iti śatapatha-śruteḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:731: tasmād yogī nātma-saṃmitād annād adhikaṃ nyūnaṃ vāśnīyād ity arthaḥ /

GE07bhg4c06u:736: tathātinidrā-śīlasyātijāgrataś ca yogo naivāsti he 'rjuna sāvadhāo bhavety abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:738: nādhmātaḥ kṣudhitaḥ śrānto na ca vyākula-cetanaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:739: yuñjīta yogaṃ rājendra yogī siddhy-artham ātmanaḥ //
GE07bhg4c06u:740: nātīśīte na caivoṣṇe na dvandve nānilānvite /
GE07bhg4c06u:741: kāleṣv eteṣu yuñjīta na yogaṃ dhyāna-tat-paraḥ // ity ādi //16//
GE07bhg4c06u:743: yogābhyāsa-niṣṭhasya niyamam āha nātyaśanata iti dvyābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:746: vāyoḥ saṅcaraṇārthaṃ tu caturtham avaśeṣayet // iti //16//
GE07bhg4c06u:747: baladevaḥ : yogam abhyasyato bhojanādi-niyamam āha nātīti dvyābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:756: yukto niyata āhāro vihāraś ca gatir yasya /
GE07bhg4c06u:757: karmasu kāryeṣu yuktā niyatā ceṣṭā yasya /
GE07bhg4c06u:761: evam āhārādi-niyama-virahiṇo yoga-vyatirekam uktvā tan-niyamavato yogānvayam āha yuktāhāra iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:765: tathānyeṣv api praṇava-japopaniṣad-āvartanādiṣu karmasu yuktā niyata-kālā ceṣṭā yasya /

GE07bhg4c06u:768: evaṃ prayanta-viśeṣeṇa sampādito yogaḥ kiṃ-phala iti tatrāha duḥkhaheti /
GE07bhg4c06u:771: ardham aśanasya sa-vyañjanasya tṛtīyam udakasya tu /
GE07bhg4c06u:774: vihārasya niyatatvaṃ yoganān na paraṃ gacched ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c06u:776: rātrer vibhāga-trayaṃ kṛtvā prathamānyayor jāgaraṇaṃ madhye svapanam iti svapnāvabodhayor niyata-kālatvam /
GE07bhg4c06u:779: yukto niyata evāhāro bhojanaṃ vihāro gamanaṃ ca yasya tasya karmasu vyavahārika-pāramārthika-kṛtyeṣu yuktā niyatā eva ceṣṭā vāg-vyāpārādyā yasya tasya //17//
GE07bhg4c06u:781: mitāhāra-vihārasya karmasu laukika-pāramārthika-kṛtyeṣu mita-vāgādi-vyāpārasya mita-svāpa-jāgarasya ca sarva-duḥkha-nāśako yogo bhavati tasmād yogī tathā tathā vartate //17//
GE07bhg4c06u:784: niḥspṛhaḥ sarva-kāmebhyo yukta ity ucyate tadā //18//
GE07bhg4c06u:785: śrīdharaḥ : kadā niṣpanna-yogaḥ puruṣo bhavatīty apekṣāyām āha yadeti /
GE07bhg4c06u:786: viniyataṃ viśeṣeṇa niruddhaṃ sac-cittam ātmany eva yadā niścalaṃ tiṣṭhati /
GE07bhg4c06u:787: kiṃ ca sarva-kāmebhya aihikāmuṣmika-bhogebhyo niḥspṛho vigata-tṛṣṇo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:790: evam ekāgra-bhūmau samprajñātaṃ samādhim abhidhāya nirodha-bhūmāv asamprajñātaṃ samādhiṃ vaktum upakramate yadeti /
GE07bhg4c06u:791: yadā yasmin kāle para-vairāgya-vaśād viniyataṃ viśeṣeṇa niyataṃ sarva-vṛtti-śūnyatām
GE07bhg4c06u:792: āpāditaṃ cittaṃ vigata-rajas-tamaskam antaḥkaraṇa-sattvaṃ svacchatvāt sarva-viṣayākāra-grahaṇa-samartham
GE07bhg4c06u:793: api sarvato-niruddha-vṛttikatvād ātmany eva pratyak citi anātmānuparakte vṛtti-rāhitye
GE07bhg4c06u:794: 'pi svataḥ-siddhasyātmākārasya vārayitum aśakyatvāc citer eva prādhānyān nyag-bhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:796: tadā tasmin sarva-vṛtti-nirodha-kāle yuktaḥ samāhita ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:798: nirgatā doṣa-darśanena sarvebhyo dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-viṣayebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā yasyeti paraṃ vairāgyam asamprajñāta-samādher
GE07bhg4c06u:802: yogī niṣpanna-yogaḥ kadā bhaved ity ākāṅkṣāyām āha yadeti /
GE07bhg4c06u:803: viniyataṃ niruddhaṃ cittam ātmani svasminn evāvatiṣṭhate niścalī-bhavatīty arthaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c06u:804: baladevaḥ : yogī niṣpanna-yogaḥ kadā syād ity apekṣāyām āha yadeti /
GE07bhg4c06u:805: yogam abhyasyato yoginaś cittam yadā viniyataṃ niruddhaṃ sadātmany eva svasminn evāvasthitaṃ sthiraṃ bhavati,
GE07bhg4c06u:808: yathā dīpo nivāta-stho neṅgate sopamā smṛtā /
GE07bhg4c06u:809: yogino yata- cittasya yuñjato yogam ātmanaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c06u:811: vāta-śūnye deśe sthito dīpo yathā neṅgate na vicalati /
GE07bhg4c06u:814: yataṃ niyataṃ cittaṃ yasya tasya niṣkampatayā prakāśakatayā cācañcalaṃ tac cittaṃ tadvat tiṣṭhatīty arthaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c06u:817: dīpa-calana-hetunā vātena rahite deśe sthito dīpo yathā calana-hetv-abhāvān neṅgate na calati,
GE07bhg4c06u:818: sopamā smṛtā sa dṛṣṭāntaś cintito yogajñaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:821: 'nutiṣṭhato ya ātmāntaḥkaraṇaṃ tasya niścalatayā sattvodrekeṇa prakāśakatayā ca niścalo
GE07bhg4c06u:823: ātmano yogaṃ yuñjata iti vyākhyāne dārṣṭāntikālābhaḥ sarvāvasthasyāpi cittasya sarvadātmākāratayātma-pada-vaiyarthyaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:825: kintu svata evātmākārasya sato 'nātmākāratā nivartyata iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:827: yata-cittasyeti bhāva-paro nirdeśaḥ karma-dhārayo vā yatasya cittasyety arthaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c06u:829: nivāta-stho nirvāta-deśa-sthito dīpo neṅgate na calati yaḥ sa eva dīpa upamā yathā yathāvad ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:830: so 'ci lope cet pāda-pūraṇam [Pāṇ 6.1.134] iti sandhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:831: kasyopamā ity ata āha yogina iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:832: baladevaḥ : tadā yogī kīdṛśo bhavatīty apekṣāyām āha yatheti /
GE07bhg4c06u:833: nirvāta-deśa-stho dīpo neṅgate na calati niścalaḥ sa-prabhas tiṣṭhati sa dīpo yathā yathāvad upamā yogajñaiḥ smṛtā cintitā /
GE07bhg4c06u:834: sopamety atra so 'ci lope cet pāda-pūraṇam [Pāṇ 6.1.134] iti sūtrāt sandhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:837: yata-cittasya niruddha-sarva-citta-vṛtter ātmano yogaṃ dhyānaṃ yuñjato 'nutiṣṭhataḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:842: sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad buddhi-grāhyam atīndriyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:843: vetti yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvataḥ //21//
GE07bhg4c06u:844: yaṃ labdhvā cāparaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ tataḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:845: yasmin sthito na duḥkhena guruṇāpi vicālyate //22//
GE07bhg4c06u:848: śrīdharaḥ : yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava [Gītā 6.2] ity ādau karmaiva yoga-śabdenoktam /
GE07bhg4c06u:849: nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti [Gītā 6.16] ity ādau tu samādhir yoga-śabdenoktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:850: tatra mukhyo yogaḥ ka ity apekṣāyāṃ samādhim eva svarūpataḥ phalataś ca lakṣayan sa eva mukhyo yoga ity āha yatreti sārdhais tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:851: yatra yasmin avasthā-viśeṣe yogābhyāsena niruddhaṃ cittam uparataṃ bhavatīti yogasya svarūpa-lakṣaṇam uktam /
GE07bhg4c06u:852: tathā ca pātañjalaṃ sūtram yogaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.2] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:855: ātmanā śuddhena manasā ātmānam eva paśyati na tu dehādi /
GE07bhg4c06u:858: yatrety ādīnāṃ yac-chandānāṃ taṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ vidyād iti caturthena ślokenānvayaḥ //20/
GE07bhg4c06u:859: ātmany eva toṣe hetum āha sukham iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:860: yatra yasminn avasthā-viśeṣe yat tat kim api niratiśayam ātyantikaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vetti /
GE07bhg4c06u:861: nanu tadā viṣayendriya-sambandhābhāvāt kutaḥ sukhaṃ syāt ?
GE07bhg4c06u:864: ataeva ca yatra sthitaḥ saṃs tattvata ātma-svarūpān naiva calati //21//
GE07bhg4c06u:866: yam ātma-sukha-rūpaṃ lābhaṃ labdhvā tato 'dhikam aparaṃ lābhaṃ na manyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:868: yasmiṃś ca sthito mahatāpi śītoṣṇādi-duḥkhena na vicālyate nābhibhūyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:870: tam iti / ya evaṃ-bhūto 'vasthā-viśeṣas taṃ duḥkha-saṃyoga-viyogaṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ vidyāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:871: duḥkha-śabdena duḥkha-miśritaṃ vaiṣayikaṃ sukham api gṛhyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:872: duḥkhasya saṃyogena saṃsparśa-mātreṇāpi viyogo yasmin tam avasthā-viśeṣaṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ yoga-śabda-vācyaṃ jānīyāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:874: yad vā duḥkha-saṃyogena viyoga eva śūre kātara-śabda-vad viruddha-lakṣaṇayā yoga ucyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:875: karmaṇi tu yoga-śabdas tad-upāyatvād aupacārika eveti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:876: yasmād evaṃ mahā-phalo yogas tasmāt sa eva yatnato 'bhyasanīya ity āha tam iti sārdhena /
GE07bhg4c06u:877: sa yogo niścayena śāstrācāryopadeśa-janitena nirveda-rahitena cetasā yoktavyaḥ /

GE07bhg4c06u:881: yatra yasmin pariṇāma-viśeṣe yoga-sevayā yogābhyāsa-pāṭavena jāte sati niruddham
GE07bhg4c06u:882: eka-viṣayaka-vṛtti-pravāha-rūpām ekāgratāṃ tyaktvā nirindhanāgnivad upaśāmyan nirvṛttikatayā
GE07bhg4c06u:884: yatra ca yasmiṃś ca pariṇāme sati ātmanā rajas-tamo 'nabhibhūta-śuddha-sattva-mātreṇāntaḥ-karaṇenātmānaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:885: pratyak-caitanyaṃ paramātmābhinnaṃ sac-cid-ānanda-ghanam anantam advitīyaṃ paśyan
GE07bhg4c06u:886: vedānta-pramāṇajayā vṛttyā sākṣātkurvann ātmany eva paramānanda-ghane tuṣyati,
GE07bhg4c06u:889: paramātma-darśane saty atuṣṭi-hetv-abhāvāt tuṣyaty eveti vā /
GE07bhg4c06u:892: yatra kāla iti tu vyākhyānam asādhu tac-chabdānanvayāt //20//
GE07bhg4c06u:893: ātmany eva toṣe hetum āha sukham iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:894: yatra yasminn avasthā-viśeṣa ātyantikam anantaṃ niratiśayaṃ brahma-svarūpam atīndriyaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:896: sattva-mātra-vāhinyā grāhyaṃ sukhaṃ yogī vetti anubhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:897: yatra ca sthito 'yaṃ vidvāṃs tattvata ātma-svarūpān naiva calati /
GE07bhg4c06u:898: taṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ vidyād iti pareṇānvayaḥ samānaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:902: buddhi-grāhyam iti sauṣupta-sukha-vyāvṛttiḥ suṣuptau buddher līnatvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:904: tad uktaṃ gauḍa-pādaiḥ - līyate tu suṣuptau tan nigṛhītaṃ na līyate iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:911: vṛttyā tu sukhāsvādanaṃ gauḍācāryais tatra pratiṣiddham - nāsvādayet sukhaṃ tatra niḥsaṅgaṃ prajñayā bhavet iti /

GE07bhg4c06u:913: taṃ vyutthāna-rūpatvena samādhi-virodhitvād yogī na kuryāt /

GE07bhg4c06u:915: nirvṛttikena tu cittena svarūpa-sukhānubhavas taiḥ pratipāditaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:916: svasthaṃ śāntaṃ sa-nirvāṇa-kathyaṃ sukham uttamam iti spaṣṭaṃ caitad upariṣṭhāt kariṣyate //21//
GE07bhg4c06u:917: yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvata ity uktam upapādayati yaṃ labdhveti /
GE07bhg4c06u:918: yaṃ ca niratiśayātmaka-sukha-vyañjakaṃ nirvṛttika-cittāvasthā-viśeṣaṃ labdhvā santatābhyāsa-paripākena sampādyāparaṃ lābhaṃ tato 'dhikaṃ na manyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:919: kṛtaṃ kṛtyaṃ prāptaṃ prāpaṇīyam ity ātma-lābhāc ca paraṃ vidyate iti smṛteḥ /

GE07bhg4c06u:921: api tan nāstīty āha yasmin paramātma-sukha-maye nirvṛttika-cittāvasthā-viśeṣe sthito

GE07bhg4c06u:924: yatroparamata ity ārabhya bahubhir viśeṣaṇair yo nivṛttikaḥ paramānandābhivyañjakaś
GE07bhg4c06u:926: duḥkha-viyogam eva santaṃ yoga-saṃjñitaṃ viyoga-śabdārtham api virodhi-lakṣaṇayā

GE07bhg4c06u:928: tathā ca bhagavān patañjalir asūtrayat yogaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.2] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:929: yogo bhavati duḥkhahā [6.17] iti yat prāg uktaṃ tad etad upasaṃhṛtam /

GE07bhg4c06u:937: utseka utsecanaṃ śoṣaṇādhvasyāyena jaloddharaṇam iti yāvat /

GE07bhg4c06u:948: tataś ca pakṣiṇa iva tasyābhimataṃ sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ //23//
