GE07bhg4c06u:978: sa ca samudraṃ śoṣayiṣāmīty eveti pratijñāya sva-mukhāgreṇaikaikaṃ jala-bindum upari pracikṣepa /
GE07bhg4c06u:979: taṃ ca bahubhiḥ pakṣibhir bandhubhir yuktyā vāryamāṇo 'pi naivopararāma /
GE07bhg4c06u:980: yadṛcchayā ca tatrāgatena nāradena nivārito 'py asmin janmani janmāntare vā samudraṃ śoṣayiṣyāmy eveti tad-agre 'pi punaḥ pratijajñe /
GE07bhg4c06u:981: tataś ca daivānukūlyāt kṛpālur nārado garuḍaṃ tat-sāhāyyāya preṣayāmāsa /
GE07bhg4c06u:982: samudras tvadīya-jñāti-droheṇa tvām avamanyata iti vākyena /
GE07bhg4c06u:983: tato garuḍa-pakṣa-vātena śuṣyan samudro 'tibhītas tāny aṇḍāni tasmai pakṣiṇe dadāv iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:984: evam eva śāstra-vacanāstikyena yoge jñāne bhaktau vā pravartamānam utsāhavantam adhyavasāyinaṃ janaṃ bhagavān evānugṛhṇātīti niścetavyam //20-23//
GE07bhg4c06u:985: baladevaḥ : nātyaśnata ity ādau yoga-śabdenoktaṃ samādhiṃ svarūpataḥ phalataś ca lakṣayati yatrety-ādi-sārdha-trayeṇa /
GE07bhg4c06u:986: yac-chabdānāṃ taṃ vidyād yoga-saṃjñitam ity uttareṇānvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:987: yogaysa sevayābhyāsena niruddhaṃ nivṛttetara-vṛttikaṃ cittaṃ yatroparamate mahat sukham etad iti sajjati /
GE07bhg4c06u:988: na tu dehādi paśyan viṣayeṣv iti citta-vṛtti-nirodhena svarūpeṇeṣṭa-prāpti-lakṣaṇena phalena ca yogo darśitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:990: yatra samādhau yat tat prasiddham ātyantikaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vetty anubhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:993: ataeva yatra sthitas tattvata ātma-svarūpān naiva calati,
GE07bhg4c06u:994: yaṃ yogaṃ labdhvaiva tato 'paraṃ lābham adhikaṃ na manyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:995: guruṇā guṇavat putra-vicchedādinā na vicāyate tam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:996: duḥkha-saṃyogasya viyogaḥ pradhvaṃso yatra taṃ yoga-saṃjñtaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1002: saṃkalpāt prabhavo yeṣāṃ tān yoga-pratikūlān sarvān kāmān aśeṣataḥ sa-vāsanāṃs tyaktvā manasaiva viṣaya-doṣa-darśinā sarvataḥ prasarantam indriya-samūhaṃ viśeṣeṇa niyamya /
GE07bhg4c06u:1006: saṅkalpo duṣṭeṣv api viṣayeṣv aśobhanatvādarśanena śobhanādhyāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1007: tasmāc ca saṅkalpād idaṃ me syād idaṃ me syād ity evaṃ-rūpāḥ kāmāḥ prabhavanti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1010: svata eva sarvān brahma-loka-paryantān aśeṣato niravaśeṣān savāsanāṃs tyaktvā,
GE07bhg4c06u:1011: ataeva kāma-pūrvakatvād indirya-pravṛttes tad-apāye sati viveka-yuktena manasaivendriya-prāptaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1012: cakṣur-ādi-karaṇa-samūhaṃ viniyamya samantataḥ sarvebhyo viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya
GE07bhg4c06u:1015: etādṛśa-yogābhyāse pravṛttasya prāthamikaṃ kṛtyam antyaṃ ca kṛtyam āha saṅkalpeti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c06u:1017: na kiṃcid api cintayed ity antyaṃ kṛtyam //24-25//
GE07bhg4c06u:1018: baladevaḥ : sa yogaḥ prārambha-daśāyāṃ niścayena prayatne kṛte saṃsetsyaty evety adhyavasāyena yoktavyo 'nuṣṭheyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1019: ātmany ayogatva-mananaṃ nirvedas tad-rahitena cetasā hṛtāṇḍārṇava-śoṣakat-pakṣivat sotsāhenety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1020: etādṛśaṃ yogam ārabhamāṇasya prāthamikaṃ kṛtyam āha saṅkalpeti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1021: saṅkalpāt prabhavo yeṣāṃ tān yoga-virodhinaḥ kāmān viṣayān aśeṣataḥ sa-vāsanāṃs tyaktvā /
GE07bhg4c06u:1026: ātma-saṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃcid api cintayet //25//
GE07bhg4c06u:1027: śrīdharaḥ : yadi tu prāktana-karma-saṃskāreṇa mano vicalet tarhi dhāraṇayā sthirīkuryād ity āha śanair iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1030: ātma-saṃstham ātmany eva samyak sthitaṃ niścalaṃ manaḥ kṛtvoparamet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1033: uparama-svarūpam āha na kiṃcid api cintayet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1034: niścale manasi svayam eva prakāśamāna-paramānanda-svarūpo bhūtvātma-dhyānād api nivartetety arthaḥ //25//
GE07bhg4c06u:1037: dhṛti-dhairyam akhinnatā tayā gṛhītā yā buddhir avaśya-kartavyatā-niścaya-rūpā tayā
GE07bhg4c06u:1038: yadā kadācid avaśyaṃ bhaviṣyaty eva yogaḥ kiṃ tvarayety evaṃ-rūpayā śanaiḥ śanair
GE07bhg4c06u:1046: vāg iti vācaṃ laukikīṃ vaidikīṃ ca manasi vyāpāravati niyacchet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1047: nānudhyāyād bahūn śabdān vāco viglāpanaṃ hi tat [BAU 4.4.21] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1051: tan manaḥ karmedriya-jñānendriya-sahakāri nana-vidha-vikalpa-sādhanaṃ karaṇaṃ jñāne jānātīti jñānam iti vyutpattyā jñātary ātmani jñātṛtvopādhāv ahaṅkāre niyacchet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1053: tac ca jñānaṃ jñātṛtvopādhim ahaṅkāram ātmani mahati mahat-tattve sarva-vyāpake niyacchet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1054: dvividho hy ahaṅkāro viśeṣa-rūpaḥ sāmānya-rūpaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1055: ayam aham etasya putra ity evaṃ vyaktam abhimanyamāno viśeṣa-rūpo vyaṣṭy-ahaṅkāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1058: sa ca hiraṇyagarbho mahān ātmeti ca sarvānusyūtatvād ucyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1059: tābhyām ahaṅkārābhyāṃ vivikto nirupādhikaḥ śāntātmā sarvāntaś cid-eka-rasas tasmin mahāntam ātmānaṃ samaṣṭi-buddhiṃ niyacchet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1061: tato nirupādhikas tvaṃ-pada-lakṣyaḥ śuddha ātmā sākṣātkṛtau bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1062: śuddhe hi cid-eka-rase pratyag-ātmani jaḍa-śakti-rūpam anirvācyam avyaktaṃ prakṛtir upādhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1063: sā ca prathamaṃ sāmānyāhaṅkāra-rūpaṃ mahat tattvaṃ nāma dhṛtvā vyaktībhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1068: indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaś ca paraṃ manaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1069: manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ //
GE07bhg4c06u:1071: puruṣān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ // [KaṭhU 1.3.10-1] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1072: tatra gavādiṣv iva vāṅ-nirodhaḥ prathamā bhūmiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1075: suṣuptāv iva mahat-tattva-śāntātmanor madhye mahat-tattvopādānam avyākṛtākhyaṃ tattvaṃ śrutyodāhāri,
GE07bhg4c06u:1078: tasya ca karma-kṣaye sati puruṣa-prayatnam antareṇa svata eva siddhatvāt tattva-darśanānupayogitvāc ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:1079: dṛśyate tvam agrayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣma-darśibhiḥ iti pūrvam abhidhāya sūkṣmatva-siddhaye nirodha-samādher abhidhānāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:1080: sa ca tattva-didṛkṣor darśana-sādhanatvena dṛṣṭa-tattvasya ca jīvan-mukti-rūpa-kleśa-kṣayāyāpekṣitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1081: nanu śāntātmany avaruddhasya cittasya vṛtti-rahitatvena suṣuptivan na darśana-hetutvam iti cet, na /
GE07bhg4c06u:1082: svataḥ-siddhasya darśanasya nivārayitum aśakyatvāt / tad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c06u:1085: yathā ghaṭa utpadyamānaḥ svato viyat-pūrṇaṃ evotpadyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1086: jala-taṇḍulādi-pūraṇaṃ tūtpanne ghaṭe paścāt puruṣa-prayatnena bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1087: tatra jalādau niḥsārite 'pi viyan-niḥsārayituṃ na śakyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1088: mukha-pidhāne 'py antarviyad avatiṣṭhata eva tathā cittam utpadyamānaṃ caitanya-pūrṇam evotpadyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1089: utpanne tu tasmin mūṣāniṣikta-druta-tāmravad ghaṭa-duḥkhādi-rūpatvaṃ bhoga-hetu-dharmādharma-sahakṛta-sāmagrī-vaśād bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1090: tatra ghaṭa-duḥkhādy-anātmākāre virāma-pratyayābhyāsena nivārite 'pi nirnimittaś cid-ākāro vārayituṃ na śakyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1091: tato nirodha-samādhinā nirvṛttikena cittena saṃskāra-mātra-śeṣatayātisūkṣmatvena nirupādhika-cid-ātma-mātrābhimukhatvād vṛttiṃ vinaiva nirvighnam ātmānubhūyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1092: tad etad āha ātma-saṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃcid api cintayed iti / ātmani
GE07bhg4c06u:1093: nirupādhike pratīci saṃsthā samāptir yasya tad-ātma-saṃsthaṃ sarva-prakāra-vṛtti-śūnyaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1094: svabhāva-siddhātmākāra-mātra-viśiṣṭaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā dhṛti-gṛhītayā viveka-buddhyā sampādyāsaṃprajñāta-samādhi-sthaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1095: san kiṃcid api anātmānam ātmānaṃ vā na cintayet,
GE07bhg4c06u:1098: ātmākāra-vṛttau ca samprajñātaḥ samādhir ity asamprajñāta-samādhi-sthairyāya kām api citta-vṛttiṃ notpādayed ity arthaḥ //25//
GE07bhg4c06u:1100: baladevaḥ : antimaṃ kṛtyam āha dhṛti-gṛhītayā dhāraṇāvaśīkṛtyā buddhyā mana ātma-saṃsthaṃ kṛtvātmānaṃ dhyātvā samādhāv uparameta tiṣṭhet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1105: yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram /
GE07bhg4c06u:1106: tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet //26//
GE07bhg4c06u:1107: śrīdharaḥ : evam api rajo-guṇa-vaśād yadi manaḥ pracalet tarhi punaḥ pratyāhāreṇa vaśīkuryād ity āha yato yata iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1108: svabhāvataś cañcalaṃ dhāryamāṇam apy asthiraṃ mano yaṃ yaṃ viṣayaṃ prati nirgacchati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1109: tatas tataḥ pratyāhṛtyātmany eva sthiraṃ kuryāt //26//
GE07bhg4c06u:1111: evaṃ nirodha-samādhiṃ kurvan yogī śabdādīnāṃ citta-vikṣepa-hetūnāṃ madhye yato yato
GE07bhg4c06u:1112: yasmād yasmān nimittāc chabdāder viṣayād rāga-dveṣādeś ca cañcalaṃ vikṣepābhimukhaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1113: san mano niścarati vikṣiptaṃ sad viṣayābhimukhīṃ pramāṇa-viparyaya-vikalpa-smṛtīnām
GE07bhg4c06u:1115: tathā laya-hetūnāṃ nidrāśeṣa-bahv-aśana-śramādīnāṃ madhye yato yato nimittād asthiraṃ layābhimukhaṃ san mano niścarati līnaṃ sat samādhi-virodhinīṃ nidrākhyāṃ vṛttim utpādayati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1116: tatas tato vikṣepa-nimittāl laya-nimittāc ca niyamyaitan mano nirvṛttikaṃ kṛtvātmany eva sva-prakāśa-paramānanda-ghane vaśaṃ nayen nirundhyāt
GE07bhg4c06u:1117: yathā na vikṣipyeta na vā līyeteti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1121: suprasannaṃ laye caiva yathā kāmo layas tathā //
GE07bhg4c06u:1123: ajaṃ sarvam anusmṛtya jātaṃ naiva tu paśyati //
GE07bhg4c06u:1124: laye sambodhayec cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ śamayet punaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1126: nāsvādayet sukhaṃ tatra niḥsaṅgaḥ prajñayā bhavet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1128: yadā na līyate cittaṃ na ca vikṣipyate punaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1129: aniṅganam anābhāsaṃ niṣpannaṃ brahma tat tadā //
GE07bhg4c06u:1131: upāyena vakṣyamāṇena vairāgyābhyāsena kāma-bhogayor vikṣiptaṃ pramāṇa-viparyaya-vikalpa-smṛtīnām anyatamayāpi vṛttyā pariṇataṃ mano nigṛhṇīyān nirundhyād ātmany evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1133: tathā līyate 'sminn iti layaḥ suṣuptaṃ tasmin suprasannam āyāsa-varjitam api mano nigṛhṇīyād eva /
GE07bhg4c06u:1135: tatrāha - yathā kāmo viṣaya-gocara-pramāṇādi-vṛtty-utpādanena samādhi-virodhī tathā layo 'pi nidrākhya-vṛtty-utpādanena samādhi-virodhī /
GE07bhg4c06u:1137: ataḥ kāmādi-kṛta-vikṣepād iva śramādi-kṛta-layād api mano niroddhavyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1139: ity ucyate sarvaṃ dvaitam avidyā-vijṛmbhitam alpaṃ duḥkham evety anusmṛtya -- yo vai bhūmā tat sukhaṃ,
GE07bhg4c06u:1141: [ChāU 7.23.1] atha yad alpaṃ tan martyaṃ [ChāU 7.23.1] tad duḥkham iti śruty-arthaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1142: gurūpadeśād anu paścāt paryālocya kāmāṃś cintyamānāvasthān viṣayān bhogān bhujyamānāvasthāṃś
GE07bhg4c06u:1145: kāmaś ca bhogaś ca kāma-bhogaṃ tasmān mano nivartayed iti vā /
GE07bhg4c06u:1147: dvaita-vismaraṇaṃ tu paramopāya ity āha ajaṃ brahma sarvaṃ na tato 'tiriktaṃ kiṃcid astīti śāstrācāryopadeśād anantaram anusmṛtya tad-viparītaṃ dvaita-jātaṃ na paśyaty eva /
GE07bhg4c06u:1151: evaṃ vairāgya-bhāvanā-tattva-darśanābhyāṃ viṣayebhyo nivartyamānaṃ cittaṃ yadi dainandina-layābhyāsa-vaśāl
GE07bhg4c06u:1152: layābhimukhaṃ bhavet tadā nidrā-śeṣājīrṇa-bahv-aśana-śramāṇāṃ laya-kāraṇānāṃ nirodhena
GE07bhg4c06u:1154: yadi punar evaṃ prabodhyamānaṃ dainandina-prabodhābhyāsa-vaśāt kāma-bhogayor vikṣiptaṃ syāt tadā vairāgya-bhāvanayā tattva-sākṣātkāreṇa ca punaḥ śamayet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1155: evaṃ punaḥ punar abhyasyato layāt sambodhitaṃ viṣayebhyaś ca vyāvartitam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1157: sa-kaṣāyaṃ rāga-dveṣādi-prabala-vāsanā-vaśena stabdhībhāvākhyena kaṣāyeṇa doṣeṇa yuktaṃ vijānīyāt samāhitāc cittād vivekena jānīyāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:1158: tataś ca nedaṃ samāhitam ity avagamya laya-vikṣepābhyām iva kaṣāyād api cittaṃ nirundhyāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:1159: tataś ca laya-vikṣepa-kaṣāyeṣu parihṛteṣu pariśeṣāc cittena samaṃ brahma prāpyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1160: tac ca samaprāptaṃ cittaṃ kaṣāya-laya-bhrāntyā na cālayet,
GE07bhg4c06u:1162: kintu dhṛti-gṛhītayā buddhyā laya-kaṣāya-prāpter vivicya tasyām eva sama-prāptāv atiyatnena sthāpayet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1164: etāvantaṃ kālam ahaṃ sukhīti sukhāsvāda-rūpāṃ vṛttiṃ na kuryāt samādhi-bhaṅga-prasaṅgāt iti prāg eva kṛta-vyākhyānam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1165: prajñayā yad upalabhyate sukhaṃ tad apy avidyā-parikalpitaṃ mṛṣaivety evaṃ-bhāvanayā niḥsaṅgo nispṛhaḥ sarva-sukheṣu bhavet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1166: athavā prajñayā sa-vikalpa-sukhākāra-vṛtti-rūpayā saha saṅgaṃ parityajet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1167: na tu svarūpa-sukham api nirvṛttikena cittena nānubhavet svabhāva-prāptasya tasya vārayitum aśakyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:1168: evaṃ sarvato nivartya niścalaṃ prayatna-vaśena kṛtaṃ cittaṃ svabhāva-cāñcalyād viṣayābhimukhatayā niścarad bahir nirgacchad ekīkuryāt prayatnataḥ,
GE07bhg4c06u:1171: ity ucyate yadā na līyate nāpi stabdhībhavati tāmasatva-sāmyena laya-śabdenaiva stabdhībhāvasyopalakṣaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:1177: evaṃ laya-kaṣāyābhyāṃ vikṣepa-sukhāsvādābhyāṃ ca rahitam aniṅganam iṅganaṃ calanaṃ sa-vāta-pradīpaval layābhimukhya-rūpaṃ tad-rahitaṃ nivāta-pradīpa-kalpam
GE07bhg4c06u:1178: anābhāsaṃ na kenacid viṣayākāreṇābhāsata ity etat /
GE07bhg4c06u:1180: yadaivaṃ doṣa-catuṣṭaya-rahitaṃ cittaṃ bhavati tadā tac cittaṃ brahma niṣpannaṃ samaṃ brahma prāptaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1183: buddhiś ca na viceṣṭeta tām āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim //
GE07bhg4c06u:1184: tāṃ yogam iti manyante sthirām indriya-dhāraṇām /
GE07bhg4c06u:1185: apramattas tadā bhavati yogo hi prabhavāpyayau // [KaṭhU 2.3.11-2] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1186: etan-mūlakam eva ca yogaś citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.2] iti sūtram /
GE07bhg4c06u:1187: tasmād yuktaṃ tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany evaṃ vaśaṃ nayed iti //27//
GE07bhg4c06u:1189: yadi ca prāktana-doṣodgama-vaśād rajo-guṇa-spṛṣṭaṃ manaś cañcalaṃ syāt,
GE07bhg4c06u:1190: tadā punar yogam abhyased ity āha yato yata iti //26//
GE07bhg4c06u:1191: baladevaḥ : yadi kadācit prāktana-sūkṣma-doṣān manaḥ pracalet tadā tat pratyāhared ity āha yata iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1192: yaṃ yaṃ viṣayaṃ prati mano nirgacchati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1193: tatas tata etan mano niyamya pratyāhṛtyātmany eva niratiśaya-sukhatva-bhāvanayā vaśaṃ kuryāt //26//
GE07bhg4c06u:1195: praśānta-manasaṃ hy enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1197: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ pratyāhārādibhiḥ punaḥ punar mano vaśīkurvan rajo-guṇa-kṣaye sati yoga-sukhaṃ prāpnotīty āha praśānteti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1198: evam ukta-prakāreṇa śāntaṃ rajo yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1199: ataeva praśāntaṃ mano yasya tam enaṃ niṣkalmaṣam brahmatvaṃ prāptaṃ yoginaṃ uttamam sukhaṃ samādhi-sukhaṃ svayam evopaiti prāpnoti //27//
GE07bhg4c06u:1201: evaṃ yogābhyāsa-balād ātmany eva yoginaḥ praśāmyati manaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1203: prakarṣeṇa śāntaṃ nirvṛttikatayā niruddhaṃ saṃskāra-mātra-śeṣaṃ mano yasya taṃ praśānta-manasaṃ vṛtti-śūnyatayā nirmanaskam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1204: nirmanaskatve hetu-garbhaṃ viśeṣaṇa-dvayaṃ śānta-rajasaṃ akalmaṣam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1205: śāntaṃ vikṣepakaṃ rajo yasya taṃ vikṣepa-śūnyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1206: tathā na vidyate kalmaṣam laya-hetus tamo yasya tam akalmaṣam laya-śūnyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1207: śānta-rajasam ity anenaiva tamo-guṇopalakṣaṇe ' kalmaṣam saṃsāra-hetu-dharmādharmādi-varjitam iti vā /
GE07bhg4c06u:1208: brahma-bhūtaṃ brahmaiva sarvam iti niścayena samaṃ brahma prāptaṃ jīvan-muktam enaṃ yoginam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1213: tathā ca prāg-vyākhyātaṃ sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad ity atra //27//
GE07bhg4c06u:1215: tataś ca pūrvavad eva tasya samādhisukhaṃ syād ity āha praśānteti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1217: baladevaḥ : evaṃ prayatamānasya pūrvavad eva samādhi-sukhaṃ syād ity āha praśānteti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1218: praśāntam ātmany acalaṃ mano yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1221: brahma-bhūtaṃ sākṣāt-kṛta-viviktāvirbhāvitāṣṭa-guṇakātma-svarūpaṃ yoginaṃ praty uttamam ātmānubhava-rūpaṃ mahat sukhaṃ kartā svayam evopaiti
GE07bhg4c06u:1225: śrīdharaḥ : tataś ca kṛtārtho bhavatīty āha yuñjann iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1226: evam anena prakāreṇa sarvadātmānaṃ mano yuñjan vaśīkurvan /
GE07bhg4c06u:1229: yogī sukhenānāyāsena brahmaṇaḥ saṃsparśo 'vidyā-nivartakaḥ sākṣātkāras tad evātyantaṃ sukham aśnute /
GE07bhg4c06u:1232: uktaṃ sukhaṃ yoginaḥ sphuṭīkaroti yuñjann iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1233: evam manasaivendriya-grāmam ity ādy-ukta-krameṇātmānaṃ manaḥ sadā yuñjan samādadhad
GE07bhg4c06u:1234: yogī yogena nitya-sambandhī vigata-kalmaṣo vigata-malaḥ saṃsāra-hetu-dharmādharma-rahitaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1236: viṣayāsparśena saha brahmaṇaḥ sparśas tādātmyaṃ yasmiṃs tad-viṣayāsaṃsparśi brahma-svarūpam ity etat /
GE07bhg4c06u:1237: atyantaṃ sarvānantān paricchedān atikrāntaṃ niratiśayaṃ sukham ānandam aśnute vyāpnoti,
GE07bhg4c06u:1241: sarva-vṛtti-śūnyena sūkṣmeṇa manasā sukhānubhavaḥ samādhāv evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1243: te cāntarāyā darśitā yoga-sūtreṇa - vyādhi-styāna-saṃśaya-pramādālasyāvirati-bhrānti-darśanālabdha-bhūmikatvānavasthitatvāni citta-vikṣepās te 'ntarāyāḥ [YogaS 1.30] /
GE07bhg4c06u:1244: cittaṃ vikṣipanti yogād apanayantīti citta-vikṣepā yoga-pratipakṣāḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1246: vyādhy-ādayas tu sapta vṛtti-sahacaritatayā tat-pratipakṣā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1248: styānam akarmaṇyatā guruṇā śikṣyamāṇasyāpy āsanādi-karmānarhateti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c06u:1249: yogaḥ sādhanīyo na vety ubhaya-koṭi-spṛg-vijñānaṃ saṃśayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1250: sa cātad-rūpa-pratiṣṭhatvena viparyayāntargato 'pi sann ubhaya-koṭi-sparśitvaika-koṭi-sparśitva-rūpāvāntara-viśeṣa-vivakṣayātra viparyayād bhedenoktaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1251: / pramādaḥ samādhi-sādhanānām anuṣṭhāna-sāmarthye 'py ananuṣṭhāna-śīlatā viṣayāntara vyāpratatayā yoga-sādhaneṣv audāsīnyam iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c06u:1252: ālasyaṃ satyām apy audāsīnya-pracyutau kaphādinā tamasā ca kāya-cittayor gurutvam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1253: tac ca vyādhitvenāprasiddham api yoga-viṣaye pravṛtti-virodhi /
GE07bhg4c06u:1255: bhrānti-darśanaṃ yogāsādhane 'pi tat-sādhanatva-buddhis tathā tat-sādhane 'piy asādhanatva-buddhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1258: anavasthitatvaṃ labdhāyām api samādhi-bhūmau prayatna-śaithilyāc cittasya tatrāpratiṣṭhitatvam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1259: ta ete citta-vikṣepā nava yogamalā yoga-pratipakṣā yogāntarāyā iti cābhidhīyante /
GE07bhg4c06u:1260: duḥkha-daurmanasyāṅgam ejayatva-śvāsa-praśvāsā vikṣepa-saha-bhuvaḥ [YogaS 1.31] duḥkhaṃ cittasya rājasaḥ pariṇāmo bādhanālakṣaṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1261: tac cādhyātmikaṃ śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ca vyādhi-vaśāt kāmādi-vaśāc ca bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1263: daurmanasyam icchā-vighātādi-balavad duḥkhānubhava-janitaś cittasya tāmasaḥ pariṇāma-viśeṣaḥ kṣobhā-para-paryāyaḥ stabdhībhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1266: prāṇena bāhyasya vāyor antaḥ-praveśanaṃ śvāsaḥ samādhy-aṅga-recaka-virodhī /
GE07bhg4c06u:1267: prāṇana koṣṭhyasya vāyor bahir niḥsaraṇaṃ praśvāsaḥ samādhy-aṅga-pūraka-virodhī /
GE07bhg4c06u:1272: tīvra-saṃvegānām āsanne [YogaS 1.21] samādhi-lābhe prastuta īśvara-praṇidhānād vā
GE07bhg4c06u:1273: [YogaS 1.23] iti pakṣāntaram uktvā praṇidheyam īśvaraṃ kleśa-karma-vipākāśayair aparāmṛṣṭaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1276: sa pūrveṣām api guruḥ kālenānavacchedāt [YogaS 1.24-6] iti tribhiḥ sūtraiḥ pratipādya tat-praṇidhānaṃ dvābhyām asūtrayat -- tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1278: tataḥ pratyak-cetanādhigamo 'py antarāyābhāvaś ca [YogaS 1.29] tataḥ praṇava-japa-rūpāt
GE07bhg4c06u:1282: abhyāsa-vairāgyābhyām antarāya-nivṛttau kartavyāyām abhyāsa-dārḍhyārtham āha -- tat-pratiṣedhārtham eka-tattvābhyāsaḥ [YogaS 1.32] /
GE07bhg4c06u:1283: teṣām antarāyāṇāṃ pratiṣedhārtahm ekasmin kasmiṃścid abhimate tattve 'bhyāsaś cetasaḥ punaḥ punar niveśanaṃ kāryam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1290: sarva-prāṇiṣu sukha-sambhogāpanneṣu sādhv etan mama mitrāṇāṃ sukhitvam iti maitrīṃ bhāvayet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1292: duḥkhiteṣu kathaṃ nu nāmaiṣā duḥkha-nivṛttiḥ syād iti kṛpām eva bhāvayet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1295: kuryān na tu vidveṣaṃ na copekṣām /
GE07bhg4c06u:1296: apuṇyavatsu caudāsīnyam eva bhāvayen nānumodanaṃ na vā dveṣam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1297: evam asya bhāvayataḥ śuklo dharma upajāyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1298: tataś ca vigata-rāga-dveṣādi-malaṃ cittaṃ prasannaṃ sad ekāgratā-yogyaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1299: maitry-ādi-catuṣṭayaṃ copalakṣaṇam abhayaṃ sattva-saṃśuddhir ity ādīnām amānitvam adambhitvam ity ādīnāṃ ca dharmāṇām,
GE07bhg4c06u:1301: rāga-dveṣau mahā-śatrū sarva-puruṣārtha-pratibandhakau mahatā prayatnena parihartavyāv ity etat-sūtrārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1302: evam anye 'pi prāṇāyāmādaya upāyāś citta-prasādanāya darśitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1303: tad etac citta-prasādanaṃ bhagavad-anugraheṇa yasya jātaṃ taṃ praty evaitad vacanam - sukheneti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1306: tataś ca kṛtārtha eva bhavatīty āha yuñjann iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1307: sukham aśnute jīvan-mukta eva bhavatīty arthaḥ //28//
GE07bhg4c06u:1308: baladevaḥ : evaṃ svātma-sākṣātkārānantaraṃ paramātma-sākṣātkāraś ca labhata ity āha yuñjann iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1309: evam ukta-prakāreṇa ātmānaṃ svaṃ yuñjan yogenānubhavata tenaiva vigata-kalmaṣo dagdha-sarva-doṣo
GE07bhg4c06u:1310: yogī sukhenānāyāsena brahma-saṃsparśaṃ paramātmānubhavam atyantam aparimitaṃ sukham
GE07bhg4c06u:1315: śrīdharaḥ : brahma-sākṣātkāram eva darśayati sarva-bhūta-stham iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1318: tathā sa svam ātmānam avidyākṛta-dehādi-pariccheda-śūnyaṃ sarva-bhūteṣu brahmādi-sthāvarānteṣv avasthitaṃ paśyati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1321: tad evaṃ nirodha-samādhinā tvaṃ-pada-lakṣye tat-pada-lakṣye ca śuddhe sākṣātkṛte
GE07bhg4c06u:1322: tadaikya-gocarā tattvam asīti vedānta-vākya-janyā nirvikalpaka-sākṣātkāra-rūpā vṛttir
GE07bhg4c06u:1324: tataś ca kṛtsnāvidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttyā brahma-sukham atyantam aśnuta ity upapādayati tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1326: sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvara-jaṅgameṣu śarīreṣu bhoktṛtayā sthitam ekam eva vibhum ātmānaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1329: tasmiṃś cātmani sākṣiṇi sarvāṇi bhūtāni sākṣyāṇy ādhyāsikena sambandhena bhogyatayā
GE07bhg4c06u:1330: kalpitāni sākṣi-sākṣyayoḥ sambandhāntarānupapatter mithyā-bhūtāni paricchinnāni jaḍāni
GE07bhg4c06u:1332: kaḥ ? yoga-yuktātmā yogena nirvikcāra-vaiśāradya-rūpeṇa yuktaṃ prasādaṃ prāpta ātmāntaḥkaraṇaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c06u:1333: tathā ca prāg evoktaṃ - nirvicāra-vaiśāradye 'dhyātma-prasādaḥ [YogaS 1.47] ṛtaṃbharā
GE07bhg4c06u:1334: tatra prajñā [YogaS 1.48] śrutānumāna-prajñābhyām anya-viṣayā viśeṣārthatvāt [YogaS 1.49] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1336: yugapat sūkṣmaṃ vyavahitaṃ viprakṛṣṭaṃ ca sarvaṃ tulyam eva paśyatīti sarvatra samaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1337: darśanaṃ yasyeti sarvatra sama-darśanaḥ sann ātmānam anātmānaṃ ca yoga-yuktātmā yathā-sthitam īkṣata iti yuktam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1338: athavā yo yoga-yuktātmā yo vā sarvatra-sama-darśanaḥ sa ātmānam īkṣata iti yogi-sama-darśināv ātmekṣaṇādhikāriṇāv uktau /
GE07bhg4c06u:1339: yathā hi citta-vṛtti-nirodhaḥ sākṣi-sākṣātkāra-hetus tathā jaḍa-vivekena sarvānusyūta-caitanya-pṛthak-karaṇam api /
GE07bhg4c06u:1342: dvau kramau citta-nāśasya yogo jñānaṃ ca rāghava /
GE07bhg4c06u:1345: prakārau dvau tato devo jagāda paramaḥ śivaḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1346: citta-nāśasya sākṣiṇaḥ sakāśāt tad-upādhi-bhūta-cittasya pṛthak-karaṇāt tad-adarśanasya /
GE07bhg4c06u:1348: samprajñāta-samādhau hi ātmaikākāra-vṛtti-pravāha-yuktam antaḥ-karaṇa-sattvaṃ sākṣiṇānubhūyate niruddha-sarva-vṛttikaṃ tūpaśāntatvān nānubhūyata iti viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1349: dvitīyas tu sākṣiṇi kalpitaṃ sākṣyam anṛtatvān nāsty eva sākṣy eva tu paramārtha-satyaḥ kevalo vidyata iti vicāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1350: tatra pratamam upāyaṃ prapañca-paramārthatā-vādino hairaṇyagarbhādayaḥ prapedire /
GE07bhg4c06u:1352: śrīmac-chaṅkara-bhagavat-pūjya-pāda-matopajīvinas tv aupaniṣadāḥ prapañcānṛtatva-vādino dvitīyam evopāyam upeyuḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1354: kalpitasya bādhitasya cittasya tad-dṛśyasya cādarśanam anāyāsenaivopapadyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1355: ataeva bhagavat-pūjya-pādāḥ kutrāpi brahma-vidāṃ yogāpekṣāṃ na vyutpādayāṃ babhūva /
GE07bhg4c06u:1356: ataeva caupaniṣadāḥ paramahaṃsāḥ śraute vedānta-vākya-vicāra eva gurum upasṛtya pravartante brahma-sākṣātkārāya na tu yoge /
GE07bhg4c06u:1357: vicāreṇaiva citta-doṣa-nirākaraṇena tasyānyathā-siddhatvād iti kṛtam adhikena //29//
GE07bhg4c06u:1359: jīvan-muktasya tasya brahma-sākṣātkāraṃ darśayati sarva-bhūta-stham ātmānam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1360: paramātmanaḥ sarva-bhūtādhiṣṭhātṛtvam ātmanīti paramātmanaḥ sarva-bhūtādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:1364: baladevaḥ : evaṃ niṣpaṇṇa-samādhiḥ pratyakṣita-sva-parātma-yogī parātmanaḥ sarvagatatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1365: tad anyātmanāṃ druhiṇādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ tad-āśrayatvaṃ tasyāviṣayamatvaṃ cānubhavatīty āha sarveti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1366: yoga-yuktātmā siddha-samādhis tad ātmānaṃ ātatatvāc ca mātṛtvād ātmā hi paramo hariḥ iti smṛteḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1367: yo mām iti vivaraṇāc ca paramātmānaṃ sarva-bhūta-stham nikhilaṃ jīvāntaryāmiṇam īkṣate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1368: ātmani tasminn āśraya-bhūte sarva-bhūtāni ca tam eva sarva-jīvāśrayaṃ cekṣate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1370: tat tat-karmānuguṇyenoccāvacatayā sṛṣṭeṣu sarveṣu jīveṣu samam vaiṣamya-śūnyaṃ parātmānaṃ paśyatīti tathā //29//
GE07bhg4c06u:1372: yo māṃ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṃ ca mayi paśyati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1373: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati //30//
GE07bhg4c06u:1374: śrīdharaḥ : evambhūtātma-jñāne ca sarva-bhūtātmayā mad-upāsanaṃ mukhyaṃ kāraṇam ity āha yo mām iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1375: māṃ parameśvaraṃ sarvatra bhūta-mātre yaḥ paśyati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1376: sarvaṃ ca prāṇi-mātraṃ mayi yaḥ paśyati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1377: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmy adṛśyo na bhavāmi /
GE07bhg4c06u:1379: pratyakṣo bhūtvā kṛpā-dṛṣṭyā taṃ vilokyānugṛhṇāmīty arthaḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c06u:1381: evaṃ śuddhaṃ tva-padārthaṃ nirūpya śuddhaṃ tat-padārthaṃ nirūpayati yo mām iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1382: yo yogī mām īśvaraṃ tat-padārtham aśeṣa-prapañca-kāraṇa-māyopādhikam upādhi-vivekena
GE07bhg4c06u:1383: sarvatra prapañce sad-rūpeṇa sphuraṇa-rūpeṇa cānusyūtaṃ sarvopādhi-vinirmuktaṃ paramārtha-satyaam
GE07bhg4c06u:1385: tathā sarvaṃ ca prapañca-jātaṃ māyayā mayy āropitaṃ mad-bhinnatayā mṛṣātvenaiva paśyati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1387: īśvaraḥ kaścin mad-bhinno 'stīti parokṣa-jñāna-viṣayo na bhavāmi,
GE07bhg4c06u:1389: yadyappi vākyajāparokṣa-jñāna-viṣayatvaṃ tvaṃ-padārthābhedenaiva tathāpi kevalasyāpi tat-padārthasya yogajāparokṣa-jñāna-viṣayatvam
GE07bhg4c06u:1391: evaṃ yogajena pratyakṣeṇa mām aparokṣīkurvan sa ca me na praṇaśyati parokṣo na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1392: svātmā hi mama sa vidvān atipriyatvāt sarvadā mad-aparokṣa-jñāna-gocaro bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1393: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham [Gītā 4.11] ity ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1395: avidvāṃs tu svātmānam api santaṃ bhagavantaṃ na parśyati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1396: ato bhagavān paśyann api taṃ na paśyati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1397: sa enam avidito na bhunakti [BAU 1.4.15] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1398: vidvāṃs tu sadaiva saṃnihito bhagavato 'nugraha-bhājanam ity arthaḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c06u:1400: evam aparokṣānubhavinaḥ phalam āha yo mām iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1402: tathā mat-pratyakṣatāyāṃ śāśvatikyāṃ satyāṃ sa yogī me mad-upāsako na praṇaśyati na kadācid api bhraśyati //30//
GE07bhg4c06u:1403: baladevaḥ : etad vivṛṇvan tathātva-darśinaḥ phalam āha yo mām iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1404: tasya tādṛśasya yogino 'haṃ paramātmā na praṇaśyāmi nādṛśyo bhavāmi /
GE07bhg4c06u:1405: sa ca yogī me na praṇaśyati nādṛśyo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1408: sarva-bhūta-sthitaṃ yo māṃ bhajaty ekatvam āsthitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1409: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi sa yogī mayi vartate //31//
GE07bhg4c06u:1410: śrīdharaḥ : na caivaṃ-bhūto vidhi-kiṅkaraḥ syād ity āha sarva-bhūta-sthitam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1411: sarva-bhūteṣu sthitaṃ mām abhedam āsthita āśrito yo bhajati sa yogī jñānī sarvathā karma-parityāgenāpi vartamāno mayy eva vartate mucyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1414: evaṃ tvaṃ-padārthaṃ tat-padārthaṃ ca śuddhaṃ nirūpya tattvam asīti vākyārthaṃ nirūpayati sarva-bhūtam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1415: sarveṣu bhūteṣv adhiṣṭhānatayā sthitaṃ sarvānusyūta-san-mātraṃ mām īśvaraṃ tat-pada-lakṣyaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1416: svena tvaṃ-pada-lakṣyeṇa sahaikatvam atyantābhedam āsthito ghaṭākāśo mahākāśa ity
GE07bhg4c06u:1417: atrevopādhi-bheda-nirākaraṇena niścinvan yo bhajati ahaṃ brahmāsmīti vedānta-vākyajena
GE07bhg4c06u:1418: sākṣātkāreṇāparokṣīkaroti so 'vidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttyā jīvanmuktaḥ kṛta-kṛtya eva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1419: yāvat tu tasya bādhitānuvṛttyā śarīrādi-darśanam anuvartate tāvat prārabhda-karma-prābalyāt sarva-karma-tyāgena vā yājñavalkyādivat /
GE07bhg4c06u:1422: sarvathā yena kenāpi rūpeṇa vartamāno 'pi vyavaharann aḸ sa yogī
GE07bhg4c06u:1423: brahmāham asamīti vidvān mayi paramātmany evābhedena vartate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1424: sarvathā tasya mokṣaṃ prati nāsti pratibandha-śaṅkā tasya ha na devāś canābhūtyā īśata ātmā hy eṣāṃ sa bhavati [BAU 1.4.10] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1425: devā mahā-prabhāvā api tasya mokṣābhavanāya neśate kim utānye kṣudrā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1426: brahma-vido niṣiddha-karmaṇi pravartakayo rāga-dveṣayor asambhavena niṣiddha-karmāsambhave
GE07bhg4c06u:1427: 'pi tad aṅgīkṛtya jñāna-stuty-artham idam uktaṃ sarvathā vartamāno 'pīti hatvāpi
GE07bhg4c06u:1428: sa imān lokān na hanti na nibadhyate [Gītā 18.17] itivat //31 //
GE07bhg4c06u:1430: evaṃ mad-aparokṣānubhavāt pūrva-daśāyām api sarvatra parātma-bhāvanayā bhajato yogino na vidhi-kaiṅkaryam ity āha sarveti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1431: paramātmaiva sarva-karaṇatvād eko 'stīty ekatvam āsthitaḥ san yo bhajati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1433: sa sarvathā śāstroktaṃ karma kurvann akurvan vā vartamāno mayi vartate,
GE07bhg4c06u:1435: baladevaḥ : sa yogī mamācintya-svarūpa-śaktim anubhavann atipriyo bhavatīty āśayavān āha sarveti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1436: sarveṣāṃ jīvānāṃ hṛdayeṣu prādeśa-mātraś caturbāhur atasī-puṣpa-prabhaś cakrādidharo 'haṃ pṛthak pṛthaṅ nivasāmi /
GE07bhg4c06u:1437: teṣu bahūnāṃ mad-vigrahāṇām ekatvam abhedam āśrito yo māṃ bhajati dhyāyati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1438: so yogī sarvathā vartamāno vyutthāna-kāle sva-vihitaṃ karma kurvann akurvan vā mayi
GE07bhg4c06u:1441: śrutiś ca harer acintya-śatkikatām āha eko 'pi san bahudhā yo 'vabhāti iti / smṛtiś ca -
GE07bhg4c06u:1442: eka eva paro viṣṇuḥ sarva-vyāpī na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1443: aiśvaryād rūpam ekaṃ ca sūryavad bahudheyate // iti //31//
GE07bhg4c06u:1446: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ //32//
GE07bhg4c06u:1447: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ ca māṃ bhajatāṃ yogināṃ madhye sarva-bhūtānukampī śreṣṭha ity āha ātmaupamyeneti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1449: yathā mama sukhaṃ priyaṃ duḥkhaṃ cāpriyaṃ tathānyeṣāṃ apīti sarvatra samaṃ paśyan sukham eva sarveṣāṃ yo vāñchati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1451: sa yogī śreṣṭho mamābhimata ity arthaḥ //32//
GE07bhg4c06u:1453: evam utpanne 'pi tatva-bodhe kaścin mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayayor abhāvāj jīvanmukti-sukhaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1454: nānubhavati citta-vikṣepeṇa ca dṛṣṭa-duḥkham anubhavati so 'paramo yogī deha-pāte
GE07bhg4c06u:1457: tattva-jñāna-mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayāṇāṃ tu yugapad abhyāsād dṛṣṭa-duḥkha-nivṛtti-pūrvakaṃ jīvanmukti-sukham anubhavan prārabdha-karma-vaśāt samādher vyutthāna-kāle kiṃ syāt ?
GE07bhg4c06u:1459: ātmaivaupamyam upamā tenātma-dṛṣṭāntena sarvatra prāṇi-jāte sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1460: samaṃ tulyaṃ yaḥ paśyati svasyāniṣṭaṃ yathā na sampādayati evaṃ parasyāpy aniṣṭaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1462: sa nirvāsanatayopaśānta-manā yogī brahmavit paramaḥ śreṣṭho mataḥ pūrvasmāt, he arjuna /
GE07bhg4c06u:1463: atas tattva-jñāna-mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayāṇām akramam abhyāsāya mahān prayatna āstheya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1464: tatredaṃ sarvaṃ dvaita-jātam advitīye cid-ānandātmani māyayā kalpitatvān mṛṣaivātmaivaikaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1465: paramārtha-satyaḥ sac-cid-ānandādvayo 'ham asmīti jñānaṃ tattva-jñānaṃ pradīpa-jvālā-santānavad
GE07bhg4c06u:1466: vṛtti-santāna-rūpeṇa pariṇamamānam antaḥ-karaṇa-dravyaṃ mananātmakatvān mana ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1467: tasya nāśe nāma vṛtti-rūpa-pariṇāmaṃ parityajya sarva-vṛtti-nirodhinā nirodhākāreṇa pariṇāmaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1468: pūrvāpara-parāmarśam antareṇa sahasotpadyamānasya krodhādi-vṛtti-viśeṣasya hetuś citta-gataḥ saṃskāra-viśeṣo vāsanā pūrva-pūrvābhyāsena citte vāsyamānatvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:1469: tasyāḥ kṣayo nāma viveka-janyāyāṃ citta-praśama-vāsanāyāṃ dṛḍhāyāṃ saty api bāhye nimitte krodhādy-anutpattiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1470: tatra tattva-jñāne sati mithyā-bhūte jagati nara-viṣāṇādāv iva dhī-vṛtty-anudayād ātmanaś
GE07bhg4c06u:1471: ca dṛṣṭatvena punar-vṛtty-anupayogān nirandhanāgnivan mano naśyati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1472: naṣṭe ca manasi saṃskārodbodhakasya bāhyasya nimittasyāpratītau vāsanā kṣīyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1473: kṣīṇāyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ hetv-abhāvena krodhādi-vṛtty-anudayān mano naśyati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1474: naṣṭe ca manasi śama-damādi-sampattyā tattva-jñānam udeti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1475: evam utpanne tattva-jñāne rāga-dveṣādi-rūpā vāsanā kṣīyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1476: kṣīṇāyāṃ ca vāsanāyāṃ pratibandhābhāvāt tattva-jñānodaya iti paraspara-kāraṇatvaṃ darśanīyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1479: mithaḥ kāraṇatāṃ gatvā duḥsādhyāni sthitāni hi //
GE07bhg4c06u:1481: bhogecchāṃ dūratas tyaktvā trayam etat samāśraya // iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1482: pauruṣo yatnaḥ kenāpy upāyenāvaśyaṃ sampādayiṣyāmīty evaṃ-vidhotsāha-rūpo nirbandhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1484: tattva-jñānasya śravaṇādikaṃ sādhanaṃ mano-nāśasya yogaḥ vāsanā-kṣayasya pratikūla-vāsanotpādanam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1485: etādṛśa-viveka-yuktena pauruṣeṇa prayatnena bhogecchāyāḥ svalpāyā api haviṣā kṛṣṇa-vartmeveti nyāyena vāsanā-vṛddhi-hetutvād dūrata ity uktam
GE07bhg4c06u:1486: dvividho hi vidyādhikārī kṛtopāstir akṛtopāstiś ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:1487: tatra ya upāsya-sākṣātkāra-paryantām upāstiṃ kṛtvā tattva-jñānāya pravṛttas tasya vāsanā-kṣaya-mano-nāśaayor dṛḍhataratvena jñānād ūrdhvaṃ jīvan-muktiḥ svata eva sidhyati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1488: idānīṃtanas tu prāyeṇākṛtopāstir eva mumukṣur autsukya-mātrāt sahasā vidyāyāṃ pravartate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1489: yogaṃ vinā cij-jaḍa-viveka-mātreṇaiva ca mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayau tātkālikau sampādya śama-damādi-sampattyā śravana-manana-nididhyāsanāni sampādayati
GE07bhg4c06u:1490: taiś ca dṛḍhābhyastaiḥ sarva-bandha-vicchedi tattva-jñānam udeti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1491: avidyā-granthi-brahmatvaṃ hṛdaya-granthiḥ saṃśayāḥ karmāṇy asarva-kāmatvaṃ mṛtyuḥ punar janma cety aneka-vidho bandho jñānān nivartate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1492: tathā ca śrūyate - yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ so 'vidyā-granthiṃ vikiratīha somya
GE07bhg4c06u:1495: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare // [MuṇḍU 2.2.8]
GE07bhg4c06u:1497: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman /
GE07bhg4c06u:1498: so 'śnute sarvān kāmān saha [TaittU 1.1] tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti [ŚvetU 3.8]
GE07bhg4c06u:1499: yas tu vijñānavān bhavati sa-manaskaḥ sadā śuciḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1500: sa tu tat-padam āpnoti yasmād bhūyo na jāyate // [KaṭhU 1.3.8]
GE07bhg4c06u:1501: ya evaṃ vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati [BAU 1.4.10] ity asarvatva-nivṛtti-phalam udāhāryam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1502: seyaṃ videha-muktiḥ saty api dehe jñānotpatti-sama-kālīnā jñeyā /
GE07bhg4c06u:1503: brahmaṇy avidyādhyāropitānām eteṣāṃ bandhānām avidyā-nāśe sati nivṛttau punar utpatty-asambhavāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:1505: mano-nāśa-vāsanā-kṣayautu dṛḍhābhyāsābhāvād bhoga-pradena prārabdhena karmaṇā bādhyamānatvāc ca savāta-pradeśa-pradīpavat sahasā nivartete /
GE07bhg4c06u:1506: ata idānīṃtanasya tattva-jñāninaḥ prāk-siddhe tattva-jñāne na prayatnāpekṣā /
GE07bhg4c06u:1512: yad ādānaṃ padārthasya vāsanā sā prakīrtitā //
GE07bhg4c06u:1514: sā ca vāsanā dvividhā malinā śuddhā ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:1517: malinā tu trividhā loka-vāsanā śāstra-vāsanā deha-vāsanā ceti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1518: sarve janā yathā na nindanti tathaivācariṣyāmīty aśakyārthābhiniveśo loka-vāsanā /
GE07bhg4c06u:1519: tasyāś ca ko lokam ārādhayituṃ samartha iti nyāyena sampādayitum aśakyatvāt puruṣārthānupayogitvāc ca malinatvam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1520: śāstra-vāsanā tu trividhā pāṭha-vyasanaṃ bahu-śāstra-vyasanam anuṣṭhāna-vyasanaṃ ceti krameṇa bharadvājasya durvāsaso nidāghasya ca prasiddhā
GE07bhg4c06u:1521: malinatvaṃ cāsyāḥ kleśāvahatvāt puruṣārthānupayogitvād darpa-hetutvāj janma-hetutvāc ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:1528: doṣāpanayanam api dvividhaṃ laukikaṃ śāstrīyaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:1531: etasyāś ca sarva-prakārāyā malinatvam aprāmāṇikatvād aśakyatvāt puruṣārthānupayogitvāt punar-janma-hetutvāc ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:1532: tad etal-loka-śāstra-deha-vāsanā-trayam avivekanām upādeyatvena pratibhāsamānam api vividiṣor vedanotpatti-virodhitvād viduṣo jñāna-niṣṭhā-virodhitvāc ca vivekibhir heyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1534: ābhyantara-vāsanā tu kāma-krodha-dambha-darpādy-āsura-sampad-rūpā sarvānartha-mūlaṃ mānasī vāsanety ucyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1535: tad evaṃ bāhyābhyantara-vāsanā-catuṣṭayasya śuddha-vāsanayā kṣayaḥ sampādanīyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1539: tatra viṣaya-vāsanā-śabdena pūrvoktās tisro loka-śāstra-veda-vāsanā vivakṣitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1544: asmin pakṣe pūrvoktānāṃ catasṛṇām anayor evāntarbhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1547: tāś ca maitry-ādi-vāsanā bhagavatā patañjalinā sūtritāḥ prāk saṃkṣepeṇa vyākhyātā api punar vyākhyāyante /
GE07bhg4c06u:1550: mohād anubhūyamānaṃ sukham anuśete kaścid dhī-vṛtti-viśeṣo rājasaḥ sarvaṃ sukha-jātīyaṃ me bhūyād iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1553: yadā tu sukhiu prāṇiṣv ayaṃ maitrīṃ bhāvayet sarve 'py ete sukhino madīyā iti tadā tat sukhaṃ svakīyam eva sampannam iti bhāvayatas tatra rāgo nivartate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1554: yathā svasya rājya-nivṛttāv api putrādi-rājyam eva svakīyaṃ rājyaṃ tadvat /
GE07bhg4c06u:1555: nivṛtte ca rāge varṣāvyapāye jalam iva cittaṃ prasīdati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1556: tathā duḥkhānuśayī dveṣaḥ [YogaS 2.8] duḥkham anuśete kaścd dhī-vṛtti-viśeṣas tamo 'nugata-rajaḥ-pariṇāma īdṛśaṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvadā me mā bhūd iti / tac ca
GE07bhg4c06u:1558: na ca sarve te duḥkha-hetavo hantuṃ śakyante /
GE07bhg4c06u:1559: ataḥ sa dveṣaḥ sadā hṛdayaṃ dahati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1560: yadā tu svasyeva pareṣāṃ sarveṣām api duḥkham mā bhūd iti karuṇāṃ duḥkhiṣu bhāvayet tadā vairyādi-dveṣa-nivṛttau cittaṃ prasīdati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1562: prāṇā yathātmano 'bhīṣṭā bhūtānām api te tathā /
GE07bhg4c06u:1563: ātmaupamyena bhūteṣu dayāṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1564: etad evehāpy uktam - ātmaupamyena sarvatrety ādi /
GE07bhg4c06u:1565: tathā prāṇinaḥ svabhāvata eva puṇyaṃ nānutiṣṭhanti pāpaṃ tv anutiṣṭhanti / tad āhuḥ -
GE07bhg4c06u:1566: puṇyasya phalam icchanti puṇyaṃ necchanti mānavāḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1567: na pāpa-phalam icchanti pāpaṃ kurvanti yatnataḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1568: te ca puṇya-pāpe akriyamāṇa-kriyamāṇe paścāt-tāpaṃ janayataḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1569: sa ca śrutyānūditaḥ - kim ahaṃ sādhu nākaravaṃ kim ahaṃ pāpam akaravam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1570: yady asau puṇya-puruṣeṣu muditāṃ bhāvayet tadā tad-vāsanāvān svayam evāpramatto 'śukla-kṛṣṇe puṇye pravartate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1571: tad uktaṃ karmāśukla-kṛṣṇaṃ yoginas trividham itareṣām ayogināṃ trividhaṃ śuklaṃ śubhaṃ kṛṣṇam aśubhaṃ śukla-kṛṣṇaṃ śubhāśubham iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1572: tathā pāpa-puruṣeṣūpekṣāṃ bhāvayan svayam api tad-vāsanāvān pāpān nivartate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1573: tataś ca puṇyākaraṇa-pāpa-karaṇa-nimittasya paścāt-tāpasyābhāve cittaṃ prasīdati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1574: evaṃ sukhiṣu maitrīṃ bhāvayato na kevalaṃ rāgo nivartate kiṃtv asūyerṣyādayo 'pi nivartante /
GE07bhg4c06u:1577: yadā maitrī-vaśāt para-sukhaṃ svīyam eva sampannaṃ tadā para-guṇeṣu katham asūyādikaṃ sambhavet /
GE07bhg4c06u:1578: tathā duḥkhiṣu karuṇāṃ bhāvayataḥ śatru-vadhādikaro dveṣo yadā nivartate tadā duḥkhitva-pratiyogika-svasukhitva-prayukta-darpo 'pi nivartate
GE07bhg4c06u:1580: tad evaṃ tattva-jñānaṃ mano-nāśo vāsanā-kṣayaś ceti trayam abhyasanīyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1581: tatra kenāpi dvāreṇa punaḥ punas tattvānusmaraṇaṃ tattva-jñānābhyāsaḥ / tad uktam -
GE07bhg4c06u:1583: etad eka-paratvaṃ ca brahmābhyāsaṃ vidur budhāḥ //
GE07bhg4c06u:1584: sargādāv eva notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ nāsty eva tat sadā /
GE07bhg4c06u:1585: idaṃ jagad ahaṃ ceti bodhābhyāsaṃ viduḥ param // iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1588: yuktyā śāstrair yatante ye te 'py atrābhyāsinaḥ sthitāḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1593: ratir ghanoditā yāsau brahmābhyāsaḥ sa ucyate //
GE07bhg4c06u:1595: tasmād upapannam etat tattva-jñānābhyāsena mano-nāśābhyāsena vāsanā-kṣayābhyāsena
GE07bhg4c06u:1596: ca rāga-dveṣa-śūnyatayā yaḥ sva-para-sukha-duḥkhādiṣu sama-dṛṣṭiḥ sa paramo yogī
GE07bhg4c06u:1597: mato yas tu viṣama-dṛṣṭiḥ sa tattva-jñānavān apy aparamo yogīti //32 //
GE07bhg4c06u:1599: sādhana-daśāyāṃ yogī sarvatra samaḥ syād ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1601: sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ veti yathā mama sukhaṃ priyaṃ duḥkham apriyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c06u:1602: tathaivānyeṣām apīti sarvatra samaṃ paśyan sukham eva sarveṣāṃ yo vāñchati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1605: baladevaḥ : sarva-bhūta-hite rataḥ iti yat prāg uktaṃ,
GE07bhg4c06u:1607: vyutthāna-daśāyām ātmaupamyena sva-sādṛśyena sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca yaḥ sarvatra samaṃ paśyati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1610: sa sva-para-sukha-duḥkha-sama-dṛṣṭiḥ sarvānukampī yogī mama paramaḥ śreṣṭho 'bhimataḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1614: yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena madhusūdana /
GE07bhg4c06u:1615: etasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi cañcalatvāt sthitiṃ sthirām //33//
GE07bhg4c06u:1616: śrīdharaḥ : ukta-lakṣaṇasya yogasyāsambhavaṃ manvāno 'rjuna uvāca yo 'yam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1619: etasya sthirāṃ dīrgha-kālāṃ sthitiṃ na paśyāmi /
GE07bhg4c06u:1622: uktam artham ākṣipan arjuna uvāca yo 'yam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1623: yo 'yaṃ sarvatra samaṣṭi-lakṣaṇaḥ paramo yogaḥ sāmyena samatvena citta-gatānāṃ rāga-dveṣādīnāṃ viṣama-dṛṣṭi-hetūnāṃ nirākaraṇena tvayā sarvajñeneśvareṇoktaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1626: etasya tvad-uktasya sarva-mano-vṛtti-nirodha-lakṣaṇasya yogasya sthitiṃ vidyamānatāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1627: sthirāṃ dīrgha-kālānuvartinīṃ na paśyāmi na sambhāvayāmi aham asmad-vidho 'nyo vā
GE07bhg4c06u:1632: bhagavad-ukta-lakṣaṇasya sāmyasya duṣkaratvam ālakṣyovāca yo 'yam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1633: etasya sāmyena prāptasya yogasya sthirāṃ sārvadikīṃ sthitiṃ na paśyāmi /
GE07bhg4c06u:1634: eṣa yogaḥ sarvadā na tiṣṭhati kintu tri-catura-dināny evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1636: tathā hy ātma-duḥkha-sukha-samam eva sarva-jagad-varti-janānāṃ sukha-duḥkhaṃ paśyed iti sāmyam uktam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1637: tatra ye bandhavas taṭasthāś ca teṣu sāmyaṃ bhaved api,
GE07bhg4c06u:1638: ye ripavo ghātakā dveṣṭāro nindakāś ca teṣu na sambhaved eva /
GE07bhg4c06u:1639: na hi mayā svasya yudhiṣṭhirasya duryodhanasya ca sukha-duḥkhe sarvathā tulye draṣṭuṃ śakyete /
GE07bhg4c06u:1640: yadi ca svasya sva-ripūṇāṃ ca jīvātma-paramātma-prāṇendriya-daihika-bhūtāni samāny eveti vivekena prabalasyāticañcalasya manaso nigrahaṇāśakyatvāt
GE07bhg4c06u:1641: pratyuta viṣayāsaktena tena manasaiva vivekasya grasyamānatva-darśanād
GE07bhg4c06u:1643: baladevaḥ : uktam ākṣipann arjuna uvāca yo 'yam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1644: sāmyena sva-para-sukha-duḥkha-taulyena yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā sarvajñena proktas tasya sthirāṃ sārvadikīṃ sthitiṃ niṣṭhām apy ahaṃ na paśyāmi,
GE07bhg4c06u:1647: ayam arthaḥ - bandhuṣu udāsīneṣu ca tat sāmyaṃ kadācit syāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:1648: na ca śatruṣu nindakeṣu ca kadācid api /
GE07bhg4c06u:1649: yadi paramātmādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ sarvatrāviśeṣam iti vivekena tad grāhyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c06u:1650: tarhi na tat sārvadikaṃ aticapalasya baliṣṭhasya ca manasas tena vivekena nigrahītum aśakyatvād iti //33//
GE07bhg4c06u:1652: cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavad dṛḍham /
GE07bhg4c06u:1653: tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye vāyor iva suduṣkaram //34//
GE07bhg4c06u:1658: kiṃ ca balavad vicāreṇāpi jetum aśakyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1660: ato yathākāśe dodhūyamānasya vāyoḥ kumbhādiṣu nirodhanam aśakyaṃ tathāhaṃ tasya manaso nigrahaṃ nirodhaṃ suduṣkaraṃ sarvathā kartum aśakyaṃ manye //34//
GE07bhg4c06u:1662: sarva-loka-prasiddhatvena tad eva cañcalatvam upapādayati cañcalaṃ hīti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1663: cañcalam atyarthaṃ calaṃ sadā calana-svabhāvaṃ manaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1665: bhaktānāṃ pāpādi-doṣān sarvathā nivārayitum aśakyān api kṛṣati nivārayati teṣām eva sarvathā prāptum aśayān api puruṣārthān ākarṣati prāpayatīti vā kṛṣṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1666: tena rūpeṇa sambodhayan durnivāram api citta-cāñcalyaṃ nivārya duṣprāpam api samādhi-sukhaṃ tvam eva prāpayituṃ śaknoṣīti sūcayati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1667: na kevalam atyarthaṃ cañcalaṃ kintu pramāthi śarīram indriyāṇi ca pramathituṃ kṣobhayituṃ śīlaṃ yasya tat /
GE07bhg4c06u:1670: abhipretād viṣayāt kenāpy upāyena nivārayitum aśakyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1675: tāntanīti gurjarādau prasiddho mahā-hrada-nivāsī jantu-viśeṣo vā /
GE07bhg4c06u:1676: tasyātidṛḍhatayā balavato balavattayā pramāthinaḥ pramāthitayāticañcalasya mahā-matta-vana-gajasya
GE07bhg4c06u:1677: nigrahaṃ nirodhaṃ nirvṛttikatayāvasthānaṃ suduṣkaraṃ sarvathā kartum aśakyam ahaṃ manye /
GE07bhg4c06u:1679: yathākāśe dodhūyamānasya vāyor niścalatvaṃ sampādya nirodhanam aśakyaṃ tadvad ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1683: citta-vṛtti-nirodha-rūpeṇa tu yogena tasya nivāraṇaṃ jīvanmuktir ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1684: yasyāḥ sampādanena sa yogī paramo mata ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1686: bandhaḥ kiṃ sākṣiṇo nivāryate kiṃ vā cittāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:1690: na hi jalād ārdratvam agner voṣṇatvaṃ nivārayituṃ śakyate pratikṣaṇa-pariṇamino hi
GE07bhg4c06u:1691: bhāvā ṛte citi-śakteḥ iti nyāyena pratikṣaṇa-pariṇama-svabhāvatvāc cittasya prārabdha-bhogena
GE07bhg4c06u:1692: ca karmaṇā kṛtsnāvidyā-tat-kārya-nāśane pravṛttasya tattva-jñānasyāpi pratibandhaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1694: na ca karmaṇā sva-phala-sukha-duḥkhādi-bhogaś citta-vṛttibhir vinā sampādayituṃ śakyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1695: tasmād yadyapi svābhāvikānām api citta-pariṇāmānāṃ kathaṃcid yogenābhibhavaḥ śakyeta
GE07bhg4c06u:1696: kartuṃ tathāpi tattva-jñānād iva yogād api prārabdha-phalasya karmaṇaḥ prābalyād
GE07bhg4c06u:1697: avaśyambhāvini cittasya cāñcalye yogena tan-nivāraṇam aśakyam ahaṃ sva-bodhād eva manye /
GE07bhg4c06u:1698: tasmād anupapannam etad ātmaupamyena sarvatra sama-darśī paramo yogī mata ity arjunasyākṣepaḥ /34//
GE07bhg4c06u:1701: nanu ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ ratham eva ca [KaṭhU 1.3.3] ity ādi śruteḥ,
GE07bhg4c06u:1704: vartmāni mātrā dhiṣaṇaṃ ca sūtam [BhP 7.15.41] iti smṛteś ca
GE07bhg4c06u:1705: buddher mano niyantṛtva-darśanād vivekavatyā buddhyā mano vaśīkartuṃ śaktyam eveti ced ata āha balavat /
GE07bhg4c06u:1706: sva-praśamakam auṣudham api balavān rogo yathā na gaṇayati,
GE07bhg4c06u:1707: tathaiva svabhāvād eva baliṣṭhaṃ mano vivekavatīm api buddhim /
GE07bhg4c06u:1708: kiṃ ca dṛḍham atisūkṣma-buddhi-sūcyāpi loham iva sahasā bhettum aśakyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1709: vāyor ity ākāśe dodhūyamānasya vāyor nigrahaṃ kumbhakādinā nirodham iva yogenāṣṭāṅgena manaso 'pi nirodhaṃ duṣkaraṃ manye //34//
GE07bhg4c06u:1712: ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ ratham eva ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:1713: buddhiṃ tu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragraham eva ca //
GE07bhg4c06u:1714: indriyāṇi hayān āhur viṣayāṃs teṣu gocarān /
GE07bhg4c06u:1716: iti śruter buddhi-niyamyaṃ manaḥ śrūyate tato vivekinyāṃ buddhyāṃ śakyaṃ tad vaśīkartum iti cet tatrāha pramāthīti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1718: kutaḥ ? balavat sva-praśamakam apy auṣadhaṃ yathā balavān rogo na gaṇayati, tadvat /
GE07bhg4c06u:1719: kiṃ ca dṛḍham sūcyā lauham iva tādṛśyāpi buddhyā bhettum aśakyam ato yogenāpi tasya nigraham ahaṃ vāyor iva suduṣkaraṃ manye /
GE07bhg4c06u:1720: na hi vāyor muṣṭinā dhartuṃ śakyate atas tatropāyaṃ brūhīti //34//
GE07bhg4c06u:1724: abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate //35//
GE07bhg4c06u:1725: śrīdharaḥ : tad uktaṃ cañcalatvādikam aṅgīkṛtyaiva mano-nigrahopāyaṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca asaṃśayam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1726: cañcalatvādinā mano niroddhum aśakyam iti yad vadasi etan niḥsaṃśayam eva /
GE07bhg4c06u:1727: tathāpi tv abhyāsena paramātmākāra-pratyayā vṛttyā viṣaya-vaitṛṣṇyena ca gṛhyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1728: abhyāsena laya-pratibandhād vairāgyeṇa ca vikṣepa-pratibandhād uparata-vṛttikaṃ sat paramātmākāreṇa tiṣṭhatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1733: tam imam ākṣepaṃ pariharan śrī-bhagavān uvāca asaṃśayam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1734: samyag viditaṃ te citta-ceṣṭitaṃ mano nigrahītuṃ śakṣyasīti santoṣeṇa sambodhayati
GE07bhg4c06u:1735: he mahābāho mahāntau sākṣān mahādevenāpi saha kṛta-praharaṇau bāhū yasyeti niratiśayam utkarṣaṃ sūcayati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1736: prārabdha-karma-prābalyād asaṃyatātmanā durnigrahaṃ duḥkhenāpi nigrahītum aśakyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1737: pramāthi balavad dṛḍham iti viśeṣaṇa-trayaṃ piṇḍīkṛtyaitad uktam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1738: calaṃ svabhāva-cañcalaṃ mana ity asaṃśayaṃ nāsty eva saṃśayo 'tra satyam evaitad bravīṣīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1739: evaṃ saty api saṃyatātmanā samādhi-mātropāyena yoginābhyāsena vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate nigṛhyate sarva-vṛtti-śūnyaṃ kriyate tan mana ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:1740: anigrahītur asaṃyatātmanaḥ sakāśāt saṃyatātmano nigrahītur viśeṣa-dyotanāya
GE07bhg4c06u:1742: he kaunteyeti pitṛ-ṣvasṛ-putras tvam avaśyaṃ mayā sukhī kartavya iti sneha-sambandha-sūcanenāśvāsayati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1743: atra prathamārdhena cittasya haṭha-nigraho na sambhavatīti dvitīyārdhena tu krama-nigrahaḥ sambhavatīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1746: tatra cakṣuḥ-śrotrādīni jñānendriyāṇi vāk-pāṇy-ādīni karmendriyāṇi ca tad-golaka-mātroparodhena haṭhān nigṛhyante /
GE07bhg4c06u:1747: tad-dṛṣṭāntena mano 'pi haṭhena nigrahīṣyāmīti mūḍhasya bhrāntir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1748: na ca tathā nigrahītuṃ śakyate tad-golakasya hṛdaya-kamalasya niroddhum aśakyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:1749: ataeva ca krama-nigraha eva yuktas tad etad bhagavān vasiṣṭha āha -
GE07bhg4c06u:1751: na śakyate mano jetuṃ vinā yuktim aninditām //
GE07bhg4c06u:1755: etās tā yuktayaḥ puṣṭāḥ santi citta-jaye kila //
GE07bhg4c06u:1756: satīṣu yuktiṣv etāsu haṭhān niyamayanti ye /
GE07bhg4c06u:1757: cetas te dīpam utsṛjya vinighnanti tamo 'ñjanaiḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1759: sā hi dṛśyasya mithyātvaṃ dṛg-vastunaś ca paramārtha-satya-paramānanda-svaprakāśatavaṃ bodhayati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1760: tathā ca saty etan manaḥ sva-gocareṣu buddhvā nirindhanāgnivat svayam evopaśāmyati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1761: yas tu bodhitam api tattvaṃ na samyag budhyate yo vā vismarati tayoḥ sādhu-saṅgama evopāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1762: sādhavo hi punaḥ punar bodhayanti smārayanti ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:1763: yas tu vidyā-madādi-durvāsanayā pīḍyamāno na sādhūn anuvartitum utsahate tasya pūrvokta-vivekena vāsanā-parityāga evopāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1764: yas tu vāsanānām atiprābalyāt tās tyaktuṃ na śaknoti tasya prāṇa-spanda-nirodha eva upāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1765: prāṇa-spanda-vāsanayoś citta-prerakatvāt tayor nirodhe citta-śāntir upapadyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1768: ekasmiṃś ca tayoḥ kṣīṇe kṣipraṃ dve api naśyataḥ //
GE07bhg4c06u:1775: etāvan mātrakaṃ manye rūpaṃ cittasya rāghava /
GE07bhg4c06u:1777: yadā na bhāvyate kiṃcid dheyopādeya-rūpi yat /
GE07bhg4c06u:1778: sthīyate sakalaṃ tyaktvā tadā cittaṃ na jāyate //
GE07bhg4c06u:1779: avāsanatvāt satataṃ yadā na manute manaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1781: atra dvāv evopāyau paryavasitau prāṇa-spanda-nirodhārtham abhyāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1784: ata eva bhagavatābhyāsena vairāgyeṇa ceti dvayam evoktam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1785: ataeva bhagavān patañjalir asūtrayat abhyāsa-vairāgyābhyāṃ tan-nirodhaḥ [YogaS 1.12] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1787: āsuratvena kliṣṭānāṃ daivatvenākliṣṭānām api vṛttīnāṃ sarvāssām api nirodho nirindhanāgnivad
GE07bhg4c06u:1788: upaśamākhyaḥ pariṇāmo 'bhyāsena vairāgyeṇa ca samuccitena bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1789: tad uktaṃ yoga-bhāṣye - citta-nadī nāmobhayato-vāhinī vahati kalyāṇāya vahati pāpāya ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:1790: tatra yā kaivalya-prāg-bhārā viveka-nimnā sā kalyāṇa-vahā
GE07bhg4c06u:1791: / yā tv aviveka-nimnā saṃsāra-prāg-bhārā sā pāpa-vahā /
GE07bhg4c06u:1793: viveka-darśanābhyāsena ca kalyāṇa-srota udghāṭyate ity ubhayādhīnaś citta-vṛtti-nirodha iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1794: prāg-bhāra-nimna-pade tadā viveka-nimnaṃ kaivalya-prāg-bhāraṃ cittam ity atra vyākhyāyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1795: yathā tīvra-vegopetaṃ nadī-pravāhaṃ setu-bandhanena nivārya kulyā-praṇayena kṣetrābhimukhaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1796: tiryak-pravāhāntaram utpādyate tathā vairāgyeṇa citta-nadyā viṣaya-pravāhaṃ nivārya
GE07bhg4c06u:1797: samādhy-abhyāsena praśānta-vāhitā sampādyata iti dvāra-bhedāt samuccaya eva /
GE07bhg4c06u:1800: sarva-vyāpāroparamasya tu samādheḥ ko nāmābhyāsa iti śaṅkāṃ nivārayitum abhyāsaṃ sūtrayati sma tatra sthitau yatno 'bhyāsaḥ [YogaS 1.13] iti
GE07bhg4c06u:1801: tatra svarūpāvasthite draṣṭari śuddhe cid-ātmani cittasyāvṛttikasya praśānta-vāhitā-rūpā
GE07bhg4c06u:1802: niścalatāsthitis tad-arthaṃ yatno mānasa utsāhaḥ svabhāva-cāñcalyād bahiṣpravāha-śīlaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:1805: sa tu dīrgha-kāla-nairantarya-satkārāsevito dṛḍha-bhūmiḥ [YogaS 1.14] anirvedena dīrgha-kāla-sevito vicchedābhāvena nirantarāsevitaḥ sat-kāreṇa śraddhātiśayena cāsevitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1806: so 'bhyāso dṛḍha-bhūmir viṣaya-sukha-vāsanayā cālayitum aśakyo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1808: vicchidya sevane śraddhātiśayābhāve ca laya-vikṣepa-kaṣāya-sukhāsvādānām aparihāre vyutthāna-saṃskāra-prābalyād adṛḍha-bhūmir abhyāsaḥ phalāya na syād iti trayam upāttam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1809: vairāgyaṃ tu dvividham aparaṃ paraṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:1811: tatra pūrva-bhūmi-jayenottara-bhūmi-sampādana-vivakṣayā caturtham evāsūtrayat -- dṛṣṭānuśravika-viṣaya-vitṛṣṇasya vaśīkāra-saṃjñā vairāgyam [YogaS 1.15] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1812: striyo 'nnaṃ pānam aiśvaryam ity ādayo dṛṣṭā viṣayāḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1813: svargo videhatā prakṛti-laya ity ādayo vaidikatvenānuśravikā viṣayās teṣūbhaya-vidheṣv api satyām eva tṛṣṇāyāṃ viveka-tāratamyena yatamānādi-trayaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:1814: atra jagati kiṃ sāraṃ kim asāram iti guru-śāstrābhyāṃ jñāsāmīty udyogo yatamānam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1815: sva-citte pūrva-vidyamāna-doṣāṇāṃ madhye 'bhyasyamāna-vivekenaite pakvā ete 'vaśiṣṭā iti cikitsakavad vivecanaṃ vyatirekaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:1817: duḥkhātmatva-bodhena bhair indriya-pravṛttim ajanayantyā api tṛṣṇāyā autsukya-mātreṇa manasy avasthānam ekendriyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1818: manasy api tṛṣṇā-śūnyatvena sarvathā vaitṛṣṇyaṃ tṛṣṇā-virodhinī citta-vṛttir jñāna-prasāda-rūpā
GE07bhg4c06u:1819: vaśīkāra-saṃjñā vairāgyaṃ samprajñātasya samādher antaraṅgaṃ sādhanam asaṃprajñātasya tu bahiraṅgam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1820: tasya tv antaraṅga-sādhanaṃ param evaṃ vairāgyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1821: tac cāsūtrayat -- tat-paraṃ puruṣa-khyāter guṇa-vaitṛṣṇyam [YogaS 1.16] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:1822: samprajñāta-samādhi-pāṭavena guṇa-trayātmakāt pradhānād viviktasya puruṣasya khyātiḥ sākṣātkāra utpadyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:1823: tataś cāśeṣa-guṇa-traya-vyavahāreṣu vaitṛṣṇyaṃ yad bhavati tat-paraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ phala-bhūtaṃ vairāgyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:1824: tat-paripāka-nimittāc ca cittopaśama-paripākād avilambena kaivalyam iti //35//
GE07bhg4c06u:1826: uktam artham aṅgīkṛtya samadadhāti aśaṃśayam iti /

GE07bhg4c06u:2054: śānto dānta ity anena cānṛta-bhāṣaṇa-rūpa-vāg-vyāpāra-nirodha-rūpasya satyasya labdhatvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:2056: yoga-śāstre ca ahiṃsā-satyāsteya-brahmacaryāparigrahā yamāḥ [YogaS 2.30] iti yogāṅga-svenoktatvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:2057: yadi tu satya-śabdena brahmaivocyate tadāpi na kṣatiḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2060: tathā ca smṛtiḥ saṃnyāsād brahmaṇaḥ sthānam iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2061: tathā prātyahika-vedānta-vākya-vicārasyāpi brahma-loka-prāpti-sādhanatvāt samuditānāṃ teṣāṃ tat-sādhanatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2062: kiṃ citram / ataeva sarva-sukṛta-rūpatvaṃ yogi-caritasya taittirīyā āmananti tasyaivaṃ viduṣo yajñasya ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c06u:2065: yajñānāṃ ca kṛtaṃ sahasram akhilā devāś ca sampūjitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2066: saṃsārāc ca samuddhṛtāḥ sva-pitaras trailokya-pūjyo 'py asau
GE07bhg4c06u:2067: yasya brahma-vicāraṇe kṣaṇam api sthairyaṃ manaḥ prāpnuyāt // iti //40//
GE07bhg4c06u:2069: iha loke amutra para-loke 'pi kalyāṇaṃ kalyāṇa-prāpakaṃ yogaṃ karotīti saḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c06u:2070: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān uvāca pārtheti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2071: tasyokta-lakṣaṇasya yogina iha prākṛtike loke 'mutrāprākṛtike ca loke vināśaḥ svargādi-sukha-vibhraṃśa-lakṣaṇaḥ paramātmāvalokana-vibhraṃśa-lakṣaṇaś ca na vidyate na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:2074: kalyāṇa-kṛt niḥśreyasopāya-bhūta-sad-dharma-yogārambhī durgatiṃ tad-ubhayābhāva-rūpāṃ daridratāṃ na gacchati /
GE07bhg4c06u:2078: tata eva tātaḥ putraṃ śiṣyaṃ cātikṛpayā jyeṣṭas tathā sambodhayati //40//
GE07bhg4c06u:2080: prāpya puṇya-kṛtāṃ lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2082: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi kim asau prāpnotīty apekṣāyām āha prāpyeti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2083: puṇya-kṛtāṃ puṇya-kāriṇām aśvamedhādi-yājināṃ lokān prāpya tatra śāśvatīḥ samāḥ bahūn saṃvatsarān uṣitvā vāsa-sukham anubhūya śucīnāṃ sad-ācārāṇāṃ śrīmatāṃ dhaninām /
GE07bhg4c06u:2086: tad evaṃ yoga-bhraṣṭasya śubha-kṛttvena loka-dvaye 'pi nāśābhāve kiṃ bhavatīty ucyate prāpyeti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2087: yoga-mārga-pravṛttaḥ sarva-karma-saṃnyāsī vedānta-śravaṇādi kurvann antarāle mriyamāṇaḥ kaścit pūrvopacita-bhoga-vāsanā-prādurbhāvād viṣayebhyaḥ spṛhayati /
GE07bhg4c06u:2089: tayoḥ prathamaḥ prāpya puṇya-kṛtām aśvamedha-yājināṃ lokān arcir-ādi-mārgeṇa brahma-lokān /
GE07bhg4c06u:2091: tatra coṣitvā vāsam anubhūya śāśvatīr brahma-parimāṇenākṣāyāḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarān,
GE07bhg4c06u:2092: tad-ante śucīnāṃ śuddhānāṃ śrīmatāṃ vibhūtimatāṃ mahārāja-cakravartināṃ gehe kule bhoga-vāsanāśoṣa-sad-bhāvād ajātaśatru-janakādivad yoga-bhraṣṭo 'bhijāyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:2096: tarhi kāṃ gatim asau prāpnotīty ata āha prāpyeti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2097: puṇya-kṛtām aśvamedhādi-yājināṃ lokān iti yogasya phalaṃ mokṣo bhogaś ca bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:2098: tatrāpakva-yogino bhogecchāyāṃ satyāṃ yoga-bhraṃśe sati bhoga eva /
GE07bhg4c06u:2099: paripakva-yoginas tu bhogecchāyā asambhavān mokṣa eva /
GE07bhg4c06u:2100: kecit tu paripakva-yogino 'pi daivād bhogecchāyāṃ satyāṃ kardama-saubharyādi-dṛṣṭyā bhoagam apy āhur iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2101: śucīnāṃ sad-ācārāṇāṃ śrīmatāṃ dhanika-vaṇig-ādīnāṃ rājñāṃ vā //41//
GE07bhg4c06u:2102: baladevaḥ : aihikīṃ sukha-sampattiṃ tāvad āha prāpyeti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2103: yādṛśa-viṣaya-spṛhayā sva-dharme śithilo yogāc ca vicyuto 'yaṃ tādṛśān viṣayān ātmoddeśyaka-niṣkāma-svadharma-yogārambha-māhātmyena
GE07bhg4c06u:2104: puṇya-kṛtām aśvamedhādi-yājināṃ lokān pāpya bhuṅkte tān bhuñjāno yāvatībhis tad-bhoga-tṛṣṇā-vinivṛttis
GE07bhg4c06u:2105: tāvatīḥ śāśvatīḥ bahvīḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarāṃs teṣu lokeṣūṣitvā sthitvā tad-bhoga-vitṛṣṇas
GE07bhg4c06u:2106: tebhyo lokebhyaḥ śucīnāṃ sad-dharma-niratānāṃ yogārhāṇāṃ śrīmatāṃ dhanināṃ gehe pūrvārabdha-yoga-māhātmyāt
GE07bhg4c06u:2107: sa yoga-śreṣṭho 'bhijāyata ity alpa-kālārabdha-yogād bhraṣṭasya gatir iyaṃ darśitā //41 //
GE07bhg4c06u:2109: atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām /
GE07bhg4c06u:2110: etad dhi durlabhataraṃ loke janma yad īdṛśam //42//
GE07bhg4c06u:2113: yoga-niṣṭhānāṃ dhīmatāṃ jñāninām eva kule jāyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:2115: etaj janma stauti īdṛśaṃ yaj janma etad dhi loke durlabhataraṃ mokṣa-hetutvāt //42//
GE07bhg4c06u:2118: śraddhā-vairāgyādi-kalyāṇa-guṇādhikye tu bhoga-vāsanā-virahāt puṇya-kṛtāṃ lokān aprāpyaiva
GE07bhg4c06u:2119: yoginām eva daridrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ na tu śrīmatāṃ rājñāṃ gṛhe yoga-bhraṣṭa-janma
GE07bhg4c06u:2120: tad api durlabham aneka-sukṛta-sādhyatvān mokṣa-paryavasāyitvāc ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:2121: yat tu śucīnāṃ daridrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ brahma-vidyāvatāṃ kule janma /
GE07bhg4c06u:2123: durlabhataraṃ durlabhād api durlabhaṃ loke yad īdṛśaṃ sarva-pramāda-kāraṇa-śūnyaṃ janmeti dvitīyaḥ stūyate bhoga-vāsanā-śūnyatvena sarva-karma-saṃnyāsārhatvāt
GE07bhg4c06u:2128: baladevaḥ : cirārābdhād yogād bhraṣṭasya gatim āha athaveti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2129: yogināṃ yogam abhyasatāṃ dhīmatāṃ yoga-deśikānāṃ kule bhavaty utpadyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:2131: yogārhāṇāṃ yogam abhyasatāṃ ca kule pūrva-yoga-saṃskāra-bala-kṛtam etaj janma prākṛtānām atidurlabham //42//
GE07bhg4c06u:2134: yatate ca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau kurunandana //43//
GE07bhg4c06u:2137: sa tatra dvi-prakāre 'pi janmani pūrva-dehe bhavaṃ paurvadehikam /
GE07bhg4c06u:2138: tam eva brahma-viṣayayā buddhyā saṃyogaṃ labhate /
GE07bhg4c06u:2139: tataś ca bhūyo 'dhikaṃ saṃsiddhau mokṣe prayatnaṃ karoti //43//
GE07bhg4c06u:2143: tatra dvi-prakāre 'pi janmani pūrva-dehe bhavaṃ paurvadehikam sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa-gurūpasadana-śravaṇa-manana-nididhyāsanānāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2144: madhye yāvat-paryantam anuṣṭhitaṃ tāvat paryantam eva taṃ brahmātmaikya-viṣayayā
GE07bhg4c06u:2147: na kevalaṃ labhata eva kintu tatas tal-lābhānantaraṃ bhūyo 'dhikaṃ labdhāyā bhūmer
GE07bhg4c06u:2148: agrimāṃ bhūmiṃ sampādayituṃ saṃsiddhau saṃsiddhir mokṣas tan-nimittaṃ yatate ca prayatnaṃ karoti ca /
GE07bhg4c06u:2150: he kuru-nandana tavāpi śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ kule yoga-bhraṣṭa-janama jātam iti pūrva-vāsanā-vaśād anāyāsenaiva jñāna-lābho bhaviṣyatīti sūcayituṃ mahā-prabhāvasya kuroḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2154: ekām atha dvitīyāṃ vā tṛtīyāṃ bhūmikām uta /
GE07bhg4c06u:2157: tatra nityānitya-vastu-viveka-pūrvakād ihāmutrārtha-bhoga-vairāgyāc chama-dama-śraddhā-titikṣā-sarva-karma-saṃnyāsādi-puraḥsarā mumukṣā śubhecchākhyā prathamā bhūmikā /
GE07bhg4c06u:2159: tataḥ śravaṇa-manana-pariniṣpannasya tattva-jñānasya nirvicikitsanā-rūpā tanu-mānasā nāma tṛtīyā bhūmikā /
GE07bhg4c06u:2162: pañcama-ṣaṣṭha-saptama-bhūmayas tu jīvanmukter avāntara-bhedā iti tṛtīye prāg-vyākhyātam /
GE07bhg4c06u:2163: tatra caturthīṃ bhūmiṃ prāptasya mṛtasya jīvan-mukty-abhāve 'pi videha-kaivalyaṃ prati nāsty eva saṃśayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2164: tad-uttara-bhūmi-trayaṃ prāptas tu jīvann api muktaḥ kim u videha iti nāsty eva bhūmikā-catuṣṭaye śaṅkā /
GE07bhg4c06u:2166: tu karma-tyāgāj jñānālābhāc ca bhavati śaṅketi tatraiva praśnaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2174: śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe gupte guṇavatāṃ satām /
GE07bhg4c06u:2177: dṛṣṭvā paripatanty uccair uttaraṃ bhūmikā-kramam // iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2178: atra prāg-upacita-bhoga-vāsanā-prābalyād alpa-kālābhyasta-vairāgya-vāsanā-daurbalyena prāṇotkrānti-samaye prādurbhūta-bhoga-spṛhaḥ sarva-karma-saṃnyāsī yaḥ sa evoktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2181: eva brahma-vidāṃ sarva-pramāda-kāraṇa-śūnye kule samutpannas tasya prāktana-saṃskārābhivyaktenāyāsenaiva
GE07bhg4c06u:2182: sambhavān nāsti pūrvasyaiva mokṣaṃ praty āśaṅketi sa vasiṣṭhena nokto bhagavatā tu
GE07bhg4c06u:2186: tatra dvividhe 'pi janmani buddhyā paramātma-niṣṭhayā saha saṃyogaṃ paurvadaihikaṃ pūrva-janma-bhavam //43//
GE07bhg4c06u:2187: baladevaḥ : āmutrikīṃ sukha-sampattiṃ vaktuṃ pūrva-saṃskāra-hetukaṃ sādhanam āha tatreti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2188: tatra dvividhe janmani paurvadaihikaṃ pūrva-dehe bhavam /
GE07bhg4c06u:2190: tataś ca hṛd-viśuddhi-sva-paramātmāvaloka-rūpāyāṃ saṃsiddhau nimitte svāpotthitavad bhūyo bahutaraṃ yatate /
GE07bhg4c06u:2193: pūrvābhyāsena tenaiva hriyate hy avaśo 'pi saḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2196: tenaiva pūrva-deha-kṛtābhyāsenāvaśo 'pi kutaścid ambharāyād anicchann api saṃhriyate viṣayebhyaḥ purāvṛtya brahma-niṣṭhaḥ kriyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:2197: tad evaṃ pūrvābhyāsa-balena prayatnaṃ kurvan śanair mucyata itīmam arthaṃ kaimutya-nyāyena sphuṭayati jijñāsur iti sārdhena /
GE07bhg4c06u:2198: yogasya svarūpaṃ jijñāsur eva kevalaṃ na tu prāpta-yogaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2199: evambhūto yoge praviṣṭa-mātro 'pi pāpa-vaśād yoga-bhraṣṭo 'pi śabda-brahma vedam ativartate /
GE07bhg4c06u:2201: tebhyo 'dhikaṃ phalaṃ prāpya mucyata ity arthaḥ //44//
GE07bhg4c06u:2203: nanu yo brahma-vidāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ sarva-pramāda-kāraṇa-śūnye kule samutpannas tasya
GE07bhg4c06u:2207: tasya viṣaya-bhoga-vāsanā-prābalyāt pramāda-kāraṇa-sambhavāc ca katham ativyavahita-jñāna-saṃskārodbodhaḥ
GE07bhg4c06u:2208: kṣatriyatvena sarva-karma-saṃnyāsānarhasya kathaṃ vā jñāna-sādhana-lābha iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2210: aticira-vyavahita-janmopacitenāpi tenaiva pūrvābhyāsena prāg-arjita-jñāna-saṃskāreṇāvaśo 'pi mokṣa-sādhanāyāprayatamāno 'pi hriyate svavaśīkriyate
GE07bhg4c06u:2212: kriyate, jñāna-vāsanāyā evālpa-kālābhyastāyā api vastu-viṣayatvenāvastu-viṣayābhyo bhoga-vāsanābhyaḥ prābalyāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:2213: paśya yathā tvam eva yuddhe pravṛtto jñānāyāpratayamāno 'pi pūrva-saṃskāra-prābalyād akasmād eva raṇa-bhūmau jñānonmukho 'bhūr iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2215: aneka-janma-sahasra-vyavahito 'pi jñāna-saṃskāraḥ sva-kāryaṃ karoty eva sarva-virodhy-upamardenety abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2216: sarva-karma-saṃnyāsābhāve 'pi hi kṣatriyasya jñānādhikāraḥ sthita eva /
GE07bhg4c06u:2217: yathā pāṭac-careṇa bahūnāṃ rakṣiṇāṃ madhye vidyamānam api aśvādi-dravyaṃ svayam anicchad api tān sarvān abhibhūya sva-sāmarthya-viśeṣād evāpahriyate
GE07bhg4c06u:2218: paścāt tu kadāpahṛtam iti vimarśo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c06u:2219: evaṃ bahūnāṃ jñāna-pratibandhakānāṃ madhye vidyamāno 'pi yoga-bhraṣṭaḥ svayam anicchann
GE07bhg4c06u:2220: api jñāna-saṃskāreṇa balavatā svasāmarthaya-viśeṣād eva sarvān pratibandhakān abhibhūyātma-vaśī
GE07bhg4c06u:2222: ataeva saṃskāra-prābalyāj jijñāsur jñātum icchur api yogasya mokṣa-sādhana-jñānasya viṣayaṃ brahma,
GE07bhg4c06u:2224: so 'pi tasyām eva bhūmikāyāṃ mṛto 'ntarāle bahūn viṣayān bhuktvā mahārāja-cakravartināṃ kule samutpanno
GE07bhg4c06u:2226: vedaṃ karma-pratipādakam ativartate 'tikramya tiṣṭhati karmādhikārātikrameṇa jñānādhikārī bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2232: ataḥ śabda-brahma veda-śāstram ativartate vedokta-karma-mārgam atikramya vartate /
GE07bhg4c06u:2235: tenaiva yoga-viṣayakeṇa pūrvābhyāsena sa yogī hriyate ākṛṣyate avaśo 'pi kenacid vighnenānicchann apīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2237: yogasya jijñāsur api tu yogam abhyasituṃ pravṛttaḥ śabda-brahma sa-kāma-karma-nirūpakaṃ vedam ativartate /
GE07bhg4c06u:2243: yadaivaṃ manda-prayatno 'pi yogī parāṃ gaitṃ yāti tadā yas tu yogī prayatnād uttarottaram
GE07bhg4c06u:2244: adhikaṃ yoge yatamāno yatnaṃ kurvan yogenaiva saṃśuddha-kilbiṣo vidhūta-pāpaḥ so
GE07bhg4c06u:2245: 'nekeṣu janmasūcitena yogena saṃsiddhaḥ samyag jñānī bhūtvā tataḥ śreṣṭhāṃ gatiṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2248: yadā caivaṃ prathama-bhūmikāyāṃ mṛto 'pi aneka-bhoga-vāsanā-vyavahitam api vividha-pramāda-kāraṇavati
GE07bhg4c06u:2250: karmādhikāram atikramya jñānādhikārī bhavati tadā kim u vaktavyaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2251: vā bhūmikāyāṃ mṛto viṣaya-bhogānte labdha-mahārāja-kula-janmā yadi vā bhogam akṛtvaiva
GE07bhg4c06u:2253: bhūtvā tat-sādhanāni sampādya tat-phala-lābhena saṃsāra-bandhanān mucyata iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2255: prayatnāt pūrva-kṛtād apy adhikam adhikaṃ yatamānaḥ prayatnātirekaṃ kurvan yogī pūrvopacita-saṃskāravāṃs
GE07bhg4c06u:2257: / ataeva saṃskāropacayāt puṇyopacayāc cānekair janmabhiḥ saṃsiddhaḥ saṃskārātirekeṇa
GE07bhg4c06u:2258: puṇyātirekeṇa ca prāpta-carama-janmā tataḥ sādhana-paripākād yāti parāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatiṃ muktim /
GE07bhg4c06u:2259: nāsty evātra kaścit saṃśaya ity arthaḥ //45//
GE07bhg4c06u:2261: evaṃ yoga-bhraṃśe kāraṇaṃ yatna-śaithilyam eva ayatiḥ śraddhayopetaḥ ity uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2262: tasya ca yatna-śaithilyavato yoga-bhraṣṭasya janmāntare punar yoga-prāptir evoktā,
GE07bhg4c06u:2264: saṃsiddhis tu yāvadbhir janmabhis tasya yogasya paripākaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:2266: yas tu na kadācid api yoge śaithilya-prayatnaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2270: iti kardamokteḥ so 'pi naikena janmanā sidhyatīty āha prayatnād yatamānaḥ prakṛṣṭa-yatnād api yatnavān ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2271: tu-kāraḥ pūrvoktād yoga-bhraṣṭād asya bhedaṃ bodhayati /
GE07bhg4c06u:2275: baladevaḥ : athāmutrikīṃ sukha-sampattim āha prayatnād iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2276: pūrva-kṛtād api prayatnād adhikam adhikaṃ yatamānaḥ pūrva-vighna-bhayāt prayatnādhikyaṃ kurvan yogī tenopacitena prayatnena saṃśuddha-kilbiṣo nidhauta-nikhilānya-vāsanaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2277: evam anekair janmabhiḥ saṃsiddhaḥ paripakva-yogo yoga-paripākād eva hetoḥ parāṃ sva-parātmāvaloka-lakṣaṇāṃ gatiṃ muktiṃ yāti //45//
GE07bhg4c06u:2280: karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna //46//
GE07bhg4c06u:2281: śrīdharaḥ : yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tapasvibhya iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2288: idānīṃ yogī stūyate 'rjunaṃ prati śraddhātiśayotpādana-pūrvakaṃ yogaṃ vidhātuṃ tapasvibhya iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2289: tapasvibhyaḥ kṛcchra-cāndrāyaṇādi-tapaḥ-parāyaṇebhyo 'pi adhika utkṛṣṭo yogī tattva-jñānotpatty-anantaraṃ mano-nāśa-vāsanākṣaya-kārī /
GE07bhg4c06u:2290: vidyayā ta ārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2291: na tatra dakṣiṇā yānti nāvadvāṃsas tapasvinaḥ // iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2294: jñānibhyo 'pi parokṣa-jñānavadbhyo 'pi aparokṣa-jñānavān adhiko mato yogī /
GE07bhg4c06u:2295: evam aparokṣa-jñānavadbhyo 'pi mano-nāśa-vāsanākṣayābhāvād ajīvan-muktebhyo mano-nāśa-vāsanākṣaya-vattvena jīvan-mukto yogy adhiko mato mama saṃyataḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2296: yasmād evaṃ tasmād adhikādhika-prayatna-balāttvaṃ yoga-bhraṣṭa idānīṃ tattva-jñāna-mano-nāśa-vāsanākṣayair
GE07bhg4c06u:2297: yugapat-saṃpāditair yogī jīva-mukto yaḥ sa yogī paramo mata iti prāg-uktaḥ sa tādṛśo
GE07bhg4c06u:2301: karma-jñāna-taop-yogavatāṃ madhye kaḥ śreṣṭha ity apekṣāyām āha tapasvibhyaḥ kṛcchra-cāndrāyaṇādi-tapo-niṣṭhebhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2302: jñānibhyaḥ brahmopāsakebhyo 'pi yogī paramātmopāsako 'dhiko mata iti mamedam eva matam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2303: yadi jñānibhyo 'py adhikas tadā kim uta karmibhya ity āha karmibhyaś ceti //46//
GE07bhg4c06u:2304: baladevaḥ : evaṃ jñāna-garbho niṣkāma-karma-yogo 'ṣṭāṅga-yoga-śirasko mokṣa-hetus tādṛśād yogād vibhraṣṭsyāntatas tat-phalaṃ bhaved ity abhidhāya yoginaṃ stauti tapasvibhya iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2305: tapasvibhyaḥ kṛcchrādi-tapaḥ-parebhyaḥ jñānibhyo 'rtha-śāstra-vidbhyaḥ karmibhyaḥ sakāmeṣṭā-pūrty-ādikṛdbhyaś ca yogī mad-ukta-yogānuṣṭhātādhikaḥ śreṣṭho mataḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2306: ātma-jñāna-vaidhuryeṇa mokṣānarhebhyas tapasvy-ādibhyo mad-ukto yogī samuditātma-jñānatvena mokṣārhatvāt śreṣṭhaḥ //46//
GE07bhg4c06u:2309: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ //47//
GE07bhg4c06u:2310: śrīdharaḥ : yoginām api yama-niyamādi-parāṇāṃ madhye mad-bhaktaḥ śreṣṭha ity āha yoginām apīti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2322: idānīṃ sarva-yogi-śreṣṭhaṃ yoginaṃ vadann adhyāyam upasaṃharati yoginām iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2323: yogināṃ vasu-rudrādityādi-kṣudra-devatā-bhaktānāṃ sarveṣām api madhye mayi bhagavati
GE07bhg4c06u:2324: vāsudeve puṇya-paripāka-viśeṣād gatena prīti-vaśān niviṣṭena mad-gatenāntarātmanāntaḥ-karaṇena
GE07bhg4c06u:2325: prāg-bhavīya-saṃskāra-pāṭavāt sādhu-saṅgāc ca mad-bhajana evaṃ śraddhāvān atiśayena
GE07bhg4c06u:2326: śraddadhānaḥ sambhajante sevata satataṃ cintayati yo māṃ nārāyaṇam īśvareśvaraṃ sa-guṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2327: nirguṇaṃ vā manuṣyo 'yam īśvarāntara-sādhāraṇo 'yam ity ādi-bhramaṃ hitvā sa eva
GE07bhg4c06u:2328: mad-bhakto yogī yuktatamaḥ sarvebhyaḥ samāhita-cittebhyo yuktebhyaḥ śreṣṭho me mama
GE07bhg4c06u:2331: mad-bhaktasyaiva śreṣṭhatvāt tvaṃ mad-bhaktaḥ paramo yuktatamo 'nāyāsena bhavituṃ śakṣyasīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2332: tad anenādhyāyena karma-yogasya buddhi-śuddhi-hetor maryādāṃ darśayatā tataś ca kṛta-sarva-karma-saṃnyāsasya
GE07bhg4c06u:2333: sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ vivṛṇvatā mano-nigrahopāyaṃ cākṣepa-nirāsa-pūrvakam upadiśatā yoga-bhraṣṭasya
GE07bhg4c06u:2334: puruṣārtha-śūnyatāśaṅkāṃ ca śithilatayā karma-kāṇḍaṃ bhajanīyaṃ ca bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2335: tat-padārthaṃ nirūpayitum agrima-madhyāya-ṣaṭkam ārabhyata iti śivam //47 //
GE07bhg4c06u:2339: tarhi yoginaḥ sakāśān nāsty adhikaḥ ko 'pīty avasīyate /
GE07bhg4c06u:2340: tatra maivaṃ vācyam ity āha yoginām api /
GE07bhg4c06u:2342: tapasvibhyo jñānibhyo 'py adhika iti pañcamy-artha-kramāc ca yogibhyaḥ sakāśād apīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2344: api tu yogibhyaḥ sarvebhyo nānā-vidhebhyo yogārūḍhebhyaḥ samprajñāta-samādhy-asamprajñāta-samādhimadbhyo 'pīti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2345: yad vā yogā upāyāḥ karma-jñāna-tapo-yoga-bhakty-ādayas tadvatāṃ madhye yo māṃ bhajeta /
GE07bhg4c06u:2347: karmī tapasvī jñānī ca yogī mataḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2352: sudurlabhaḥ praśāntātmā koṭiṣv api mahāmune // iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2357: jñānaṃ ca pañcamenoktaṃ yogaḥ ṣaṣṭhena kīrtitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2358: prādhānyena tad apy etaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ karma-nirūpakam //
GE07bhg4c06u:2361: baladevaḥ : tad ittham ādyena ṣaṭkena saniṣṭhasya sādhanāni jñāna-garbhāni niṣkāma-karmāṇi
GE07bhg4c06u:2362: yoga-śiraskāny abhidhāya madhyena pariniṣṭhitāder bhagavac-charaṇādīni sādhanāny
GE07bhg4c06u:2363: abhidhāsyan tasmāt tasya śraiṣṭhyāvedakaṃ tat-sūtram abhidhatte yoginām iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2365: na ca nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhīyam astu vakṣyamāṇasya yoginas tapasvy-ādi-vilakṣaṇa-kriyatvena teṣv anantar-bhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c06u:2368: svarṇa-girer iva tad anyeṣām uccāvacānāṃ girīṇām iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2369: yaḥ śraddhāvān mad-bhakti-nirūpakeṣu śruty-ādi-vākyeṣu dṛḍha-viśvāsaḥ san māṃ nīlotpala-śyāmalam ājānu-pīvara-bāhuṃ savitṛ-kara-vikasitāravindekṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2371: sva-prabhayā diśo vitamisrāḥ kurvāṇaṃ nitya-siddha-nṛsiṃha-raghu-varyādi-rūpaṃ sarveśvaraṃ
GE07bhg4c06u:2374: ca guṇa-ratnaiḥ pūrṇaṃ bhajate śravaṇādibhiḥ sevate /
GE07bhg4c06u:2375: mad-gatena mad-ekāsaktenāntarātmanā manasā viśiṣṭas tila-mātram api mad-viyogāsahaḥ sann ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2376: mad-bhaktaḥ sarvebhyas tapasvy-ādibhyo yogibhyo mad-eka-bhakto yuktatama ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2377: atra vyācaṣṭe - nanu yoginaḥ sakāśān na ko 'py adhiko 'stīti cet tatrāha yoginām iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2378: yogāroha-tāratamyāt karma-yogino bahavas tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'pīti dhyānārūḍho yuktaḥ samādhy-ārūḍho yuktataraḥ śravaṇādi-bhaktimāṃs tu yuktatama iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2380: bhaja ity eṣa vai dhātuḥ sevāyāṃ parikīrtitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2381: tasmāt sevā budhaiḥ proktā bhakti-śabdena bhūyasī // iti smṛteḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2382: etāṃ bhaktiṃ śrutir āha śraddhā-bhakti-dhyāna-yogād avehi iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2383: yasya deve parā bhaktir yathā deve tathā gurau /
GE07bhg4c06u:2384: tasyaite kathitā hy arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ // [ŚvetU 6.23] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2385: bhaktir asya bhajanaṃ tad-ihāmutropādhi-nairāsyenāmuṣmin manaḥ-kalpanam etad eva naiṣkarmyam [GTU 1.14] iti /
GE07bhg4c06u:2387: ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyo maitreyi [BAU 2.4.5,
GE07bhg4c06u:2390: vijñāna-ghanānanda-ghanā sac-cid-ānandaika-rase bhakti-yoge tiṣṭhati [GTU 2.79] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c06u:2391: tasyāḥ śravaṇādi-kriyā-rūpatvaṃ tu cit-sukha-mūrteḥ sarveśvarasya kuntalādi-pratīkatvavat pratyetavyam /
GE07bhg4c06u:2392: śravaṇādi-rūpāyā bhakteś cid-ānandatvaṃ tv anuvṛttyānubhāvyaṃ sitānusevayā pitta-vināśe tan-mādhuryam iveti //47//
